name: Corpo/Ghost
description: Infiltrate various companies, tap into their databases and exit while avoiding contact with employees. You have been invited to participate in the virtual planning of corporate espionage missions.

name: Jungle Catz
description: Slice, Slash, Dragon Blast, all hostiles and seal time altering zones!

name: Stranded Shootout
description: Stranded Shootout is a roguelike bullet hell game about a space marine who crash-landed on an unknown planet. Upon awakening, the marine realizes that he and his ship are besieged by hostile aliens. Test your skills and see how long you can endure the endless onslaught.

name: Exiled Into Darkness
description: 1973. A world full of mysteries and horrors. Accepting a new job, you find yourself in abandoned houses, frozen in time and filled with ghosts of the past. Your guide is the mysterious notes left in these houses, which indicate what you are to do next.

name: Outbreak Overlord
description: Turn the entire population into zombies before your horde is exterminated. Be strategic in your attacks and become the apocalypse itself.

name: BuzzLabs
description: BuzzLabs is a competitive multiplayer aviation shooter with the cutest and buzziest drones ever! Pick your favorite insect or configure a little mutant from dozens of parts.

name: Dangerous World
description: "Dangerous World" is an interactive narrative adventure game where players navigate life's complexities as an ordinary girl, making choices that shape the destiny. Engage in emotional interactions, confront tough decisions, witness the consequences of your actions in this journey of self-discovery.

name: M.A.C.E. Tower Defense 2
description: M.A.C.E. Tower Defense 2, a classic tower defense game with unique towers and enemies

name: Dream Sports Platform
description: Embark on an extraordinary football journey with Dream Sports Platform - an immersive open-world action RPG that goes beyond the football simulator. Progress through levels, shape your character, and unlock rewards that bridge the gap between virtual triumphs and real-world football services.

name: Robot Girl's Dream: Robot Battle Championship
description: This game is an RPG game that follows the growth of a robot girl who has lost her memories. Players can aim for victory in the robot battle tournament, the main objective, and also enjoy interactions with both humans and robots.

name: Battle Scars Eternal Stars
description: This is a simulation game, made by an independent game developer, individual developers have limited energy, please don't have too high expectations. You play as a robot exploring a planet. You can freely drive vehicles, use weapons to attack, and more advanced weapons such as controllable missiles

name: Mermaid Tale
description: Kaya found a great place for her friend's concert. But the local forgotten spirits are a little angry. Set up the show together with other mermaids and calm the spirits of the oceans in this little explore game.

name: Roguelike Chess
description: Roguelike Chess is a turn-based strategy game inspired by chess, in which you control a piece and need to destroy the others, acquiring skills during your turns through the card system. Customize your game with skins from the store and return to the board for a new play.

name: Save Giant Girl From Monsters 2
description: A flight simulator game. Save the giant girl from the monsters attacking her using a helicopter.

name: Save Giant Girl From Monsters 3
description: A flight simulator game. Save the giant girl from the monsters attacking her using a helicopter.

name: Crash Math
description: Crash Math - You must solve math problems while trying to drive a car and avoid traps.

name: Medieval Blacksmith
description: You are a blacksmith with no past in the cruel lands where feudalism reigns. In this dark land where morality is dictated by the cold steel, the weapons you forge will determine not only your fate but also the destiny of others.

name: AsteroidTD
description: Try to survive in infinite asteroid cloud as long as possible in reworked tower defence style. FInd your own playstyle and beat your own records or chillout with original ambient soundtracks. Build, explore, think - everything to create your own colony in this cold space.

name: Skyland
description: In this gorgeous FTL-inspired tactical RTS, you and your crew must take command of a flying castle, and defend it from sky pirates while fighting enemies of increasing difficulty. Originally developed for Gameboy Advance, now available on Steam!

name: Dragons Legacy
description: Dragons Legacy is an online creature survival game set in a large, beautiful, sandbox open world with distinct dragons. Rule the world as a Flame Stalker, Shadow Scale, or Acid Spitter Drake!

name: Operation Breadcrumbs
description: A management and narrative game set in a world of birds! Play as Robin and return home to revitalize your late Pa's bed and breakfast, forging meaningful connections as you rebuild the community in the face of an encroaching corporation.

name: Strange Ocean
description: Take your ship into the air as you dodge everything from deadly pirates to dancing dolphins!

name: Mortalis Meltdown
description: Prepare for an endless onslaught of the undead in Mortalis Meltdown, a heart-pounding, action-packed top-down zombie shooter! Embrace the thrill of survival as you face wave after wave of relentless zombies, their numbers growing ever larger and their hunger for flesh never-ending.

name: Heart Beat Clue
description: "Heart Beat Clue" merges detective puzzles with romantic storylines. Players' choices affect both mysteries and relationships, offering a unique, interactive experience where love and investigation intersect.

name: AstroMart Adventures
description: Build a convenience store on an abandoned asteroid. Catch critters and other goods to sell or make them into a slushy.

name: Rust Song
description: Explore this unique sci-fi style metroidvania-like adventure world. You can acquire a variety of abilities to explore the world and assemble powerful chip combinations. You'll also have the ability to go back in time to change the map's structure and unlock shortcuts.

name: Rogue Resonance
description: Hack and slash through hordes of enemies and formidable bosses. Enhance your abilities with each skill pickup, augmenting your dash, melee combos, and powerful spells as you grow stronger. Uncover the mysteries of this captivating 3D top-down action-packed roguelike adventure.

name: Elhkia
description: Elhkia is an LLM-powered political sim where you write down your own campaign promises.

name: Cheddar Beach: Episode 0
description: Take a trip to Cheddar Beach in this interactive visual novel! Join Hamston & The Homies as they search for a crackin’ house party on a Friday night, in a world inspired by LA in the early 90’s. Let’s Chase That Cheese, Ya’ll!

name: Fluida
description: Fluida is a simulation logic game where you must complete all of 15 official stages using many types of items like Pipes, Pressure Valves, Pressure Gauges and many more! You can also create and upload your own stages to steam workshop.

name: Oil Sheik
description: Become the next Oil Sheik in this turn based strategic board game by creating the largest Oil empire. Battle 3 opponents. Found and expand companies. Buy and sell stocks.

name: Project Surfing
description: Ride the waves of speed and time! Master the art of smooth motion to stay fast and climb global leaderboards. Challenge your friends and conquer the old mighty triangles!

name: Rockhopper
description: Rockhopper is a single player asteroid mining rougelike featuring procedurally generated asteroids, robust upgrade paths and dark exploration with enemies and ancient secrets to uncover.

name: Starecrown
description: In STARECROWN, a visual-novel merged with a puzzle-based horror experience, your ANGEL whose watched from the distance finally makes himself known. For the worse.

name: Crowd Diver
description: Crowd Diver is an asymmetrical stealth multiplayer game where you can immerse yourself in the role of the Seeker, tasked with protecting the city from impending evil. Alternatively, you can become the Monster, seeking to wreak destruction and eliminate targets disguised.

name: KBF: Knight Bar Fight
description: Play as a squire defending his knight's honor in this versus couch game for 2 to 4 players. Eliminate your opponents by touching them with your sword, complete quests to satisify the tavern crowd and win the final victory !

name: Celtic Warfare
description: Celtic Warfare is an unique deckbuilder where you take up your weapons and fight the magically enchanted board. Through proper countering and combo's you defeat enemies and raid land, defeat it's king and reap all the rewards, improve you cards further take on harder raids.

name: Multi Game Party
description: Multi Game party is FIRST AN INDEPENDENT GAME, with cartoon graphics online and solo with a huge catalog of various mini games

name: Shhh!Saw
description: If you scream, it's game over! A death game linked with a microphone. Can you escape from the closed haunted house?

name: FlowerField
description: Tend and cultivate your personal little garden while you are actually working on other things. Choose for yourself in which screen areas you want to play and and watch your plants grow.

name: Sea Fantasy
description: Save the world by fishing! This is a brand new action RPG game where you stand on an adventure to fish the SeaAZ, the marine life of this world, in a vast pixel world. This is not a peaceful fishing game. The destruction of the world is imminent....

name: Necroking
description: Necroking is a turn-based tactics roguelite with pixel art graphics. You play as a Master of Necromancy. Build your sculls deck, rise skeletons and other scum to defeat settlements desecrated by life.

name: Crestfallen: Medieval Survival
description: Long live the King! Crestfallen: Medieval Survival pits players against each other to fight for land and power over the Realm. Gear your knights in the strongest armor, craft the most deadly medieval weaponry, and build a Kingdom worth defending. Lay siege and vanquish thy enemy and horrors within.

name: Polyoshapes
description: Polyoshapes is a captivating puzzle game where players engage in the strategic placement of various geometric shapes on a grid.

name: Roll A Blade
description: Dice-Building Roguelike with turn-based combat and customize-able dice.

name: Brave Glin in Fairyaria
description: Brave Glin in Fairyaria is an action-adventure platformer game in the world of Fairyaria, a wonderful fairytale. Play as Brave Glin, a little magical creature that getting lost in a forest, nedding face dangers on the way to return home!

name: Radioquacktive
description: Have you ever wondered how a duck would survive a Nuclear Apocalypse? If you want to survive the flooded wastelands, you will need to quack enemies down, scavenge supplies, and mutate to adapt to the ever-increasing monstrosities that you will encounter.

name: Fight 'N' Jokes: Storylines
description: Dive into 'Fight'N'Jokes: Storylines', an episodic 3D adventure game where puzzles, quick-time events, and rich dialogues bring the story to life. Explore the lives of iconic characters, make impactful choices, resolve conflicts, make new friends, and rise to become the true champion of the realm.

name: Gelatin Is Hungry
description: A hungry slime from Outer Space wreaks havoc throughout the Universe! Control Gelatin and plow through different levels and platforms, eat everything you can and avoid obstacles. The more you eat, the more you’ll grow. How far will your hunger take you?

name: Sustained
description: This is a open world Survival Zombie game with allot of survival mechanics and PVP in Multiplayer. Join a few friends and look who can survive the island full of zombies and other players trying to survive like you, it has base building, food, water, Temp and much more

name: Nose: Breathing Rebellion
description: Face factories of hate and gas-filled tubes to liberate the city in this 2D action-platformer set in a dark satirical world filled with puzzles and adventure. Welcome to a future, or past, dystopia where your determination pave the way to liberation.

name: Piranha Feeding
description: Piranha Feeding is a thrilling action game with rogue-lite elements, where you control a voracious school of piranhas on a quest for the ultimate feeding frenzy. Conquer a succession of prey, ranging from smaller aquatic creatures to formidable adversaries, unlocking new abilities along the way.

name: Dynamic Destruction
description: "Dynamic Destruction" is an innovative destruction simulation game. In this game, players are tasked with demolishing various structures, ranging from simple walls to complex buildings, using a plethora of tools and construction elements.

name: Chomper
description: Are you ready for a challenge? Build, research, craft, and defend in this arcade-style, dynamic real-time strategy tower defense game. Defend the core at all costs. There are no mistakes.

name: Synthetica: Cyber Club Manager
description: Run your own futuristic club in a world where high-tech meets fun nights out. Make your club the best by customizing android staff, pleasing different kinds of guests, and handling all the challenges of being the boss. Every choice you make shapes your club's success. Dive in!

name: Be Silent
description: You got trapped in a garden by something. In order to escape you have to find hints and items - but be silent, something is listening...

name: Patient No. 26
description: Patient No. 26 is an exciting horror game where the player finds himself in the dark world of an abandoned laboratory, where a sinister doctor conducts creepy experiments on his patients. You are patient No. 26 and you are fighting for your life, overcoming the challenges set by a mad doctor.

name: Outside the Door
description: Outside the door is a mystic visual novel set within one office. You are about to figure out the stories of a few visitors without having a single memory of yourself.

name: Ring Craft
description: In "Ring Craft," you will play as a ring forging master, using various materials to add useful or useless attributes to the rings. You will explore the secrets of nutrition, oop, I mean, enchantment. Whether it's miracles-craft or disaster-craft, it's all up to you!

name: Dr. Alb's Prodigy
description: Dr. Alb's Prodigy is a Roguelike Action RPG which combines turn-based and real-time combat. Play as a bio-mechanical android and help the doctor prevent the apocalypse.

name: Angel Tear: Goddess Betrayed
description: As the evil Demon God's power grows in strength, all hope seems lost. However, one day, Yuri Maishima, finds herself transforming into the powerful Angel Tear. Can she master her powers to counter this evil?

name: Rabbitra 2
description: Combined horizontal shooting and endless runner, "Clean" the enemies with "traditional" gameplay style. Try to buy items to help you "clean" more enemies and challenge for higher scores.

name: Naraku
description: This is a survival horror action game in which a young girl "Enri" tries to escape from a mysterious facility filled with blood and madness.

name: Cursed Canvas
description: Explore the cursed location, find and destroy the haunted objects while avoiding the ever-looming Cursed Canvas! When the Cursed Canvas finds you, you will encounter the fear that lies deep within your heart.

name: Dark Pact
description: Fast turn-based strategy with a focus on creativity rather than number crunching. Manipulate enemy positioning and use the environment to your advantage. Utilize clever combo's to defeat overwhelming odds.

name: Pepper
description: Dive into 'Pepper,' a mesmerizing souls-like RPG where monsters roam and mysteries await. Engage in branching dialogue, crafting your destiny with every decision. Explore diverse endings in this captivating fantasy world. Are you prepared to shape your legend in 'Pepper'?

name: Highlighters: Cosmic Puzzle Action
description: Highlighters is a fast-paced, match-4, action puzzler inspired by the likes of Tetris Attack and Puzzle Fighter, prioritizing quick thinking and quick thumbs. Featuring stylish pixel art, addictive gameplay, and out-of-this-world music!

name: Isekai Infinity: Worlds Unleashed
description: Accidently loosing her life, Aria finds her self in the spirit realm...her new life simple and relaxing is torn apart once more as she is thrust into another world. Will she have any OP skills in this new world? She must find her way back but finds that each time she fails another world awaits.

name: Dawnmaker
description: Dawnmaker is a turn-based city building and deckbuilding game. Raise luminous cities in a dark world, optimize your deck and create powerful combinations between buildings and cards!

name: Return of the USSR
description: Help revive the Soviet Union!

name: Devil Jam
description: Devil Jam invites you to plunge into the fiery depths of hell, where every note is a weapon and every step sets the rhythm of battle! Engage in intense, fast-paced runs as you mow down legions of hellish fiends to the pulse of the underworld. Defeat their overlords, and overthrow Hell itself!

name: Last of the Noticers
description: The time for noticing is over and the time for action is now. Carry out your master-plan that involves guns, explosives and computer duster or face integration into the tedium of industrial society. What will your social credit score be when your choices come to pass and the dust has settled?

name: DeMiriam Magic: Blueprint of Miracle
description: Create your sweet memories with the girls on the island, manage and build your own island in a relaxed atmosphere, operate the island's airport, and try driving a small plane to visit the island you have built

name: Start Running
description: A horror point and click game where choices matter about trying to do your final marathon training run.

name: Bloody Heaven 2
description: Inspired By the well-known rogue-like game Hades, slash out of the God Field all the way down to the Demon Domain and defy The Overlord Thanatos in the Deep Frost Hell in this rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: Animal Parkour
description: The game is an extremely action-packed and challenging adventure game. In this game, players will control cute cartoon characters and embark on an endless journey through beautiful settings on a landscape screen.

name: Stevedore 2024
description: It's intermodal mayhem! Shift that freight in a hurry without incurring disaster in this physics simulation action RPG. Learn to drive some of the oddest vehicles on the planet as you load huge ocean-crossing ships. And where is that strangely elusive operations manager, the Stevedore?

name: Farm Debt Repay Life
description: This is a farming simulation game where you can farm, mine, fish, and become friends with three cats. However, at the same time, you also face a huge and constantly growing debt. You need to continue operating your farm to earn income until you can repay the debt

name: Beyond the Breach
description: Discover a world overrun with robots, and play as a defective bot who tries to find a way to flee the facility. Find others who are the same kind, free them, and escape the laboratory!

name: Careful Gardeners
description: Fight pests and insects to protect your garden!

name: Hexagon Ultra VR
description: Hexagon Ultra is a classic 3D adaptation of a popular game: Ataxx. Turn-based board games in different environments against talking AI enemies. Fill the board, outnumber the enemy for triumph. More than 30 levels have their unique path to win!

name: Copz N Zombies
description: Gather fuel for the mothership before the zombie apocalypse begins! Single player Mayhem!

name: God's Plan
description: Dive into a chilling adventure where horror meets imagination in this first-person thriller. Picture yourself in a maze of puzzles, where the story unfolds based on how you see it. It's not just a game; it's your own twisted journey.

name: Marzia Lost In Space
description: A short linear story about a girl who has gotten herself stuck in space! Will she survive in the end or will it be her end?

name: Cave Hikers
description: A relaxing and humorous 2D interactive cartoon mockumentary that follows three characters through a cavernous world, on a quest to find the mystical “cave with an infinite ceiling”.

name: Hitm3
description: Help your love Dei make his own movie. HITM3 is a third person, slice of life adventure where you control Nam on his days in Santiago de Chile.

name: Jail Escape Plan VR
description: Launch the escape plan step by step and break out to prove your innocence in this VR prison-themed open-world escape game!

name: Bod-1
description: BOD-1 is a thrilling horror movie set in the midst of a supernatural nightmare. After a long day at work, the protagonist returns home and discovers that his apartment has turned into a sinister place filled with otherworldly powers.

name: Nauts
description: Nauts is a space action roguelike. Run and develop your civilization in a mysterious and dangerous universe. Knowledge will be your best tool: explore and discover what is hidden in to the Cosmos while surviving as many dangers that will appear on your journey.

name: Bleak Remastered
description: Immerse yourself in the dystopian world of Pinnacle with BLEAK Remastered. Experience stunning new artwork and enhanced gameplay in this dark adventure. Can you navigate the relentless hostile world and save your sister, Asha?

name: Dollmare
description: You've accepted a shady job offer at a doll factory. Inspect dolls for defects and anomalies. Follow strange protocols. Don't get fired and stay alive.

name: Neanderthal
description: Humanity's evolution as a species has accelerated over the last 30,000-40,000 years unparalleled in evolution of life on Earth. What triggered this change? Play as the Archaic Man (Player Green), Neanderthal (Player Yellow), or Cro-Magnon (Player Red) species fighting to survive .

name: Greenland
description: Greenland is a strategic turn-based survival game. Choose your tribe and fight to survive rival factions and the harsh and shifting conditions of Greenland. Become a friendly hunter and gatherer or a gruesome raider, the tribes fate is in your hands.

name: Kitt's Quest
description: A puzzle/adventure platformer with thrilling boss fights. Find hidden items to increase your power, unlock new costumes and more!

name: Elderwood Online
description: Dive back into the essence of MMORPGs with Elderwood Online, where we pay homage to the beloved classics of the late '90s and early 2000s, infused with a touch of today's innovation. Elderwood Online marries the nostalgia of golden-age MMOs with fresh adventures and discoveries.

name: Historical Invaders
description: The most wicked men that ever lived on earth. Authoritarians, dictators, and tyrants, from Hitler to Stalin, they are all back. Historical Invaders it's a fixed shooter game where you are the chosen one to annihilate the demons of our past and save mankind.

name: Escape from Bytesville
description: Action platformer game hiding a sinister secret!

name: Ghost Room
description: Strange phenomena occur one after another in one apartment. You, an exorcist, are asked to investigate and go to the room, but you are trapped by the spirits living in the room. The only way to escape is to suppress all the spiritual phenomena caused by the spirits.

name: SCP-9735-Alpha: Arch1tect
description: In SCP-9735-Alpha: ΔRCH1TECT, you step into the shoes of Jasmin Kimura, a scientist from the SCP Foundation. Your mission: Explore SCP-9735-Alpha, document findings, complete challenging tasks, and survive!

name: Charm Commerce
description: Run a business with adorable monster girls using power of desire! Employ girls, build your workplace and grow your business in the magical world. Unleash the charm of your team and watch your business thrive!

name: One More Day
description: ¡Welcome to One More Day! Embark on an exciting and challenging experience where fashion and survival intertwine in this pixel art 2D game. Confront the dark threat of endless hordes of zombies as you embody a brave hero, equipped only with trusty underwear! Survive One More Day.

name: Dark Passage
description: Delve. Explore. Discover. But most importantly, get out of the Dark Passage alive. Be the first to discover hundreds of ancient artifacts in this first person treasure hunt inspired by classic early 3D dungeon crawlers.

name: Crystal Eyes
description: Crystal Eyes is an Indie pixelart action adventure game with RPG touches.

name: Anchored Hearts: A Tale of Destiny
description: A pirate on the run, La Belladonna must escape imprisonment and prove her innocence in this roguelite adventure-meets-romance novel! Navigate wild waters, fight enemy ships, and decide to whom you’ll give your heart. Through narrative choices, unravel the truth behind your cursed fate!

name: Resurrection: Nuke Island
description: An alarm raised when CIA found that 8 scientists are missing from international virology conference. CIA started investigation and found that North Korean scientists are also missing and suspected North Koreans. Roman, special ops commando has to evacuate scientists from North Korea.

name: Save Giant Girl From Monsters 4
description: A flight simulator game. Save the giant girl from the monsters attacking her using a helicopter.

name: Don't Look at Him
description: a horror game that takes place in a forest. complete tasks, and don't get caught.

name: Eternal Burden
description: A puzzle platformer in which you play as William, a restless soul trying to go back in time to get rid of his burdens, symbolized by a metal ball chained to his body. Use the ball to your advantage to get over obstacles and to solve the physics based puzzles that block your path to liberation.

name: Mika's Battle S
description: Mika's Battle S is a 2D platform action game based on the story of a warrior who has been commanded to defend Sunshineland territory against the attacks from the enemy soldiers belonging to the Rogho Corporation.

name: Chromatic Memories
description: A visual novel about grief, memory and acceptance. Nayara is a painter of memories: she digs into her clients’ minds to change or even erase their memories. One day she realizes she has altered her own memory. What was so painful or unbearable that she wanted to forget it for good?

name: Gnomemade
description: Gnomemade is a card-based baking game where you manage a gnome-run bakery, satisfy your fellow gnomes' specific tastes by creating all kinds of traditional, weird, wacky and even mystical creations!

name: Fortuna Deluxe
description: Survive waves of enemies raining bullets on you with the help of your trusty Automatic Turret Machines (ATMs) while you focus on more important priorities: making bank. It's equal parts bullet hell, tower defense, incremental game, and rogue-lite. Coming out later this year in 2024!

name: Big Ear Detective
description: Ironic point & click adventure where a once brilliant detective quits his trade to test software and make a living. But even in the seemingly mundane world of office life, there are secrets to be uncovered. Navigate through puzzles, quirky colleagues, and intrigues to crack corporate mysteries.

name: Race Elcano
description: The new car is not electric, nor is it a flying car. The new car is a one-button driving car. Control the direction and speed of the car simultaneously with a single button. To turn you also accelerate and to accelerate you also turn, difficult to master but intuitive.

name: Drill Hero Legend
description: 2D action-adventure platformer with a drill-head hero! Get ready to drill and blast everything in front of you in this challenging game made by fans of classic 90s platformers! Shoot, slide, enter tubes and be launched by cannons, drill everything in your path!

name: Pursuit of Laughter
description: Your spirit has been reawakened by the Jester God and you must embark on a journey where humor and darkness intertwine, navigate mysteries with laughter as your guide in a world where whimsy shadows logic.

name: Card Racer
description: Unleash the ultimate adrenaline rush with Card Racer — a fusion of exciting car combat and intricate card tactics!

name: Cherno
description: Escape game where it is necessary to collect the clues to obtain the key and thus level up until you leave the building without being touched by the Russian experiments that seek to devour you. Show your ingenuity to look for clues in the dark and your agility to dodge the experiments' attacks.

name: Skulls of Olympus
description: Skulls of Olympus is an action RPG where you collect Gods from Greek Mythology to battle across dozens of worlds.

name: Lift: The Last Days of The Westwind
description: An interactive VR narrative adventure in which you operate a fully interactive elevator, meet fascinating characters, and make decisions that change their lives, and the fate of the hotel forever.

name: Flawed Tactics
description: Build an unstoppable team of adorable characters ready to destroy all enemies!

name: Survivors
description: "Survivors" is a first-person shooter roguelite experience. Armed with four weapons, engage in intense battles against diverse enemies, confront bosses, and strive to survive until the end. Making choices among items and enhancing your character's capabilities through purchases in the shop.

name: Micro Stream RPG
description: A tiny, auto-play RPG for Twitch streamers to engage with their chat. Let your viewers battle through dangerous dungeons and tough enemies, all in the background while you stream!

name: Macho Scooping
description: "Macho Scooping" Battle for Up to 4 Players! Compete to scoop as many cute and unique muscular specimens swimming in the tank as possible within the given time for an entertaining and adorable spectacle!

name: OCRPG
description: An Arcade Styled RPG with surprises, laughs and horrors at every turn.

name: Spells and Sacrifice
description: A Lovecraftian dungeon crawler, learn occult spells to survive and descend through the scourge pit. Find that which was imprisoned long ago.

name: Strashna 2
description: Explore a mansion that is constantly changing, finding clues that will help you discover the history of this house. This place has many surprises and secrets, so keep your eyes peeled.

name: Gravity
description: Embark on a captivating journey with "Gravity," a thrilling puzzle game challenging your problem-solving skills across 100 levels. Unlike a mundane physics lesson, this game injects excitement and fun into the world of puzzles.

name: Maya Prophecy
description: Challenge numerous high-difficulty bosses and achieve victory through tactical planning and character growth. Success or failure depends on your strategy. Can you save the world?

name: Hospital of the Undead
description: You must escape a hospital overrun by zombies. Shoot your enemies and avoid the dark to preserve your sanity while managing your limited resources.

name: DungeonTomb
description: "DungeonTomb" immerses players in dungeon exploration, shooting, and adventure. Delve into the mysterious underworld, confront endless mazes, and battle vicious monsters. In this perilous kingdom, face thrilling battles, explore ruins, and unlock powerful weapons. Challenge reflexes and strategy!

name: Carrier 2: The Next Mutation
description: An unreleased sequel to the Dreamcast game Carrier. Why it got cancelled is believed to do with Jaleco's financial troubles at the time.

name: Maverick Hunter
description: What was supposed to’ve been a first person shooter in the Mega Man universe developed by Armature Studios, only to get cancelled after 6 months of development.

name: Charlie Brown’s All-Stars
description: An unreleased baseball based off the Peanuts series.

name: UDLR_Modify
description:
To reach your goal, you must change yourself.

This game can be difficult, but the difficulty curve dips down every time a new mechanic is introduced. If you get stuck, don't be afraid to skip ahead - there is no penalty for doing so! Progress is saved as long as you have third-party cookies enabled.

name: OneState
description: OneState is the world's first RolePlay game with an open world and 500+ people online in one map! Choose your own path in OneState!

name: Wheelie Racer
description: A racing game produced by Epoch for the Super Cassette Vision in 1985.

name: PPAP: The Game
description: PPAP: The Game is a rhythm action mobile game released on Line based on Pikotaro's PPAP music video.

name: Honest Hearts Reborn
description: A story overhaul mod for the Honest Hearts DLC, with a whole new story for Joshua Graham, the tribes, the Legion, and the New Canaanites. Fully-voiced with almost 30 completely new NPCs, deep moral choices, and a fresh take on the story of the Burned Man. Literary, intelligent, with plenty of explosions and gunslinging.

name: Ariko's Enchanted Forest
description: It's a fun 2D jumping game for kids as well as for adults. The game takes place in an enchanted forest full of witches. Your mission is to collect as many coins as possible and get out of there.

name: Gakuen Handsome Chocolate
description:
Gakuen Handsome Chocolate is a spin of Gakuen Handsome series.
The theme is valentine's day. You can give chocolates the characters to ask them out.

name: Potato Sack Racing Simulator 2024: Digital Deluxe Mega Chad Edition
description: I know what you are thinking, and yes, this game does feature the ability to fight grandparents, mugs, speakers and of course dirty tissues... Wait, this is a game about Potato Sack Racing? Umm.. Yeah there are like 4 levels about Potato Sack Racing out of the 17 levels... Phew, we almost forgot to make it have something to do with Potato Sack Racing! But now trust me bro, this game is the BEST Potato Sack Racing game to have ever been made! At least, from what we could find.. Yeah this is actually the first and only Potato Sack Racing game, it’s almost like it’s not a good idea to make a game about Potato Sack Racing, it’s pretty fun to say Potato Sack Racing. Potatooooo sack racingggggg!!!!

name: Beat the Clock
description: Beat The Clock is all about being faster than time itself. Can you get to the hour mark before the clock does? Time, the creator and destroyer of all. No one can beat time right? Well maybe you can.

name: Beat the Clock: Hardcore
description: This is the hardcore version of Beat The Clock. You may have beaten the clock before, but now you need to do it on a larger scale. 24 hours of scale.

name: The Dating Game
description:
The Dating Game is a 1-bit memory puzzle game in the style of a dating simulator!
Created by Acerola apart of Ludwig's 2021 Game Jam.

name: Sega Golf Club: Network Pro Tour
description: Sin descripción

name: MotoGP 24
description: Challenge your abilities in MotoGP, Moto2 and Moto3 categories, and immerse yourself in the exhilarating journey of the 2024 campaign. Experience the thrill of official rosters and tracks exclusive to MotoGP24!

name: Sega Golf Club Version 2006: Next Tours
description: Sin descripción

name: Dirt 5: Energy Content Pack
description: The Energy Content Pack for Dirt 5 adds new vehicles, events, sponsors, and customization options to Dirt 5!

name: Smile, you're being filmed
description: Survive three nights by repairing anomalies, but beware of the killer who is lurking and ready to hunt you down! Your survival depends on careful observation and taking into account every detail. Explore every corner of the house, discover clues and use objects provided to escape your attacker. Scary surprises and unexpected twists await you at every turn. Can you unravel the mystery while avoiding constant danger? Up to you !

name: Dawn Raider
description: Dawn Raider is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up made by Taiwanese developer Softstar Entertainment that was released for DOS in 1990.

name: Skyward
description:
A great journey to the sky starts with a single step.
Through dynamic Escher-style labyrinths you will reach your inner peace in this endless one-tap-one-step gam
Or push your patience and reflexes to the limit in a brand new dark hardcore mode!
Tap on the screen at the right time, when the circle is above the tile, to make a step.
Get higher scores to unlock new patterns and beat everyone in the leaderboard!

name: Thru the City
description:
Pick your car and try to get as far as you can!
Through the City is a dynamic endless racing game that will challenge your reflex.
Pick car, get ready and drive through the city as far as you can. Drive your car through traffic and avoid obstacles.
Cross roads and sidewalks. Collect credits and unlock new unique cars.
Touch left or right side of screen to turn - it's that simple.

name: Spellcard Academy
description: A roguelike deckbuilder where you play as a witch studying wacky schools of magic like Llamamancy and Spookymancy. Summon monsters to fight for you. Scrounge together components to cast powerful spells. Mix and match spell combos as you journey for lost astral knowledge.

name: Anime Thighs
description: Who doesn't like Anime Thighs?

name: Picnic Peril
description: Picnic Peril is a strategy game where your goal is to lure and stall ants to stop them from ruining your picnic. Combine the unique abilities of various foods to strategize and engage in a battle of wits with the ants! Go all out in this caloric colosseum!

name: Dangerous Galaxy
description: Build your ship abilities in a creative way to destroy the evil foes that await you in the dangerous galaxy. A roguelike experience with physics-based combat, resource management, and freedom to play your way.

name: Petris
description: A new, simple and easy puzzle game you can play forever has finally arrived. It is called Petris.Rotate the shapes, move them right or left and try to create as many lines as you can.Colorful, relaxing game. Playing Petris may improve your cognitive skills.

name: Sworn
description: Sworn is a 1-4 player co-op action rogue-like. Explore and reclaim a fallen Camelot from the reign of a corrupted Arthur and his Knights of the round table.

name: Kingdom Two Crowns: Call of Olympus
description: Explore islands of ancient legends and mythos, seek the favors of the gods to challenge and defend against Greed of epic scales in this major expansion - Kingdom Two Crowns: Call of Olympus.

name: Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons - Sacred Reunion
description: Sin descripción

name: Blood Servants
description: Go it alone or bring your friends as you slash, burn, and loot your way through dungeons in a near-endless quest for power!

name: Nyan Heroes
description: Step into Nyan Heroes, a free-to-play, third-person hero shooter where intelligent cats pilot powerful mechs known as Guardians. Experience agility, strategy, and precision in a world shaped by feline intelligence.

name: Because of Magic
description: A tower defense game where you equip them with magical abilities.

name: Sniperbot: The Hype Game
description: SNIPERBOT: THE HYPE GAME is a retro styled, rhythm-based action platformer; It’s Mega Man meets Crypt of the NecroDancer. The player traverses through the cybertech world of Meta Metro. Where Hypebeasts run wild, clout is currency and the only way to survive is attacking your enemies and fighting boss battles with a blaster and sword, all while keeping on beat to a late 80s / early 90s Hip Hop soundtrack!

name: Rush Hero
description: Touch and drag to move the hero in order to avoid the falling rocks!!! What is your best score?

name: Fit In The Hole
description:
You are a cube on a journey through the walls.
Find the gap in the wall, roll over the terrain and try to fit inside.
Don't get hit by the wall!

name: Karporam
description: A beat em up/fighting game inspired by fighting games from the 90s, as well as shounen anime.

name: Dice Mage
description: DICE MAGE is a spell combat RPG with magical exploding dice. Explore floating worlds, fight enemies and win loot in high-stakes games of chance on a quest to defeat evil.

name: What's Wong With the Girls' Staircase
description:
In a legally distinct school of witchcraft and wizardry, something is wrong with the girls' staircase. It’s enchanted to keep boys out, but now it seems to be keeping the girls out too. Or is it?

Join Thara Min, and her best friend Clara on this short cute story about identity and acceptance, and validation!

Submitted for the Trans Wizards are Wizards game bundle, all proceeds go to supporting LGBTQ creators.

name: Hollo Ball
description:
Hollo Ball will keep you hooked for hours!
One finger control. Easy to play, hard to master.
Features unlimited gameplay.
Build your newest addiction!

name: Serenity
description: A short atmospheric exploration game. You are invited to visit a small island in the middle of the sea.

name: Aqua Fortis Aqua Valis
description: Ride on a dolphin and hunt toucans. Avoid aggressive aquatic life. Find special fruits. Explore 16 levels of wide open psychedelic oceans.

name: Resort Hotel: Bay Story
description:
Help Alice and her new friends restore the old hotel and turn it into a successful resort! Dive into an intriguing story and start transforming the beach to your liking!
Resort Hotel is a fun arcade puzzle game where you'll restore a family mansion by solving the classical levels of three in a row puzzles. Build and design the estate and turn it into a first-class Resort Hotel. Become a hotel tycoon! To implement this plan, solve interesting Match 3 puzzles, get resources, and decorate the interior of the house, tropical island, and garden escapes. Enjoy new Match-3 game mechanics, adorable characters, and an exciting romantic story created in front of your eyes!

name: Funky Restaurant
description:
Funky Food, nice shots and your RESTAURANT!
Mix of arcade food throwing and restaurant manager.
Upgrade and unlock new funny characters.

Have you ever dreamed of creating restaurant empire? Hard work makes miracles - from tiny burger booth to huge luxury restaurant chain. Become rich, found new restaurants, upgrade, hire cooks and chefs. Collect all funny characters, earn money and have fun serving food from all around the world!

name: Bridge Builder Simulator
description:
Become the ultimate bridge constructor in this super addictive Bridge Building Brain Teaser!
If you have ever wondered how all those awesome structures are built, you now have a chance to take matters into your hands and build one for yourself!

name: Raver's Rumble
description: Sin descripción

name: Flaming Flagon
description:
Flaming Flagon is a romances + nsfw VN set in a fantasy world populated with anthro "mon" characters.

In this game, you will work in Flaming Flagon, a tavern popular among adventurers. Here you will get to meet all sorts of adventurers and co-workers, learn their stories and finds your own path in this world.

name: Monkey Math School Sunshine
description: Numeracy and fundamental math skills can be difficult to present to young players, and Monkey Math School Sunshine is designed to navigate those challenges. With Milo by their side, kids will move from basic counting to addition, subtraction and complex pattern recognition. By keeping the games focused, and through the utilization of our Knack Technology, we instinctively adjust the challenge levels to each individual player.

name: PlatterMania
description: The player has to spin a certain amount of platters on a stick at the same time for 8 seconds.

name: Binairo
description: Binairo for Playdate is an easy to play and quick to learn logic puzzle. Fill the grid with ones and zeroes to win the game. Are you ready to put your mind to the test? Choose between 6x6 or 8x8 puzzle sizes and two different levels of difficulty: Easy or Hard.

name: Crayola Adventures
description: Step into the world of Crayola Adventures, where open-ended storytelling and adventure-style gameplay merge. You get to be the author, the illustrator and the hero as you craft and color creative stories.

name: Ringside Seat
description: You manage the greatest boxers of all time.

name: So Who's Dr. Rabbit?
description: An edutainment mystery game about the wonders of oral hygiene.

name: Galaga Wars+
description: This is a special edition of Galaga Wars exclusively for Apple Arcade. It has no ads, and the microtransactions have been removed.

name: S.C.I.M.M.A.R.'s
description: 1st person shooter

name: Duke Forces
description: A long time ago, in a culture far, far away... games were games and Duke Nukem was a badass. Take Dark Forces, the 1995 Star Wars shooter, add Duke Nukem 3D, the 1996 classic shooter, enhance these two with awesome levels made by the community, force powers, light sabers, new art and sprite edits galore, plus some new gameplay mechanics, and you get Duke Forces.

name: Borg Nukem
description: Duke's mission was just to check out what was happening on Voyager since they had lost contact with the huge ship but it looks like Duke's mission will be a little bigger since there are Borgs all over the place and you can't just beam back! The only place you can beam to is a Borg ship! This is not looking too good for our man Duke.

name: Duke Nukem Xmas 2014
description: This is a single-level Christmas themed map from Balls Of Steel team (it's true first release, too). It's set in a small town, in a snowy, rocky land; the mission is to clean it from aliens and get out of it.To give players a nice experience.

name: Summon Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Episode XOXO
description: Episode XOXO is a collection of interactive romance stories where you choose your destiny.

name: Kingdoms: Merge & Build
description: Match things to rebuild your kingdom in this puzzle game exclusive to Apple Arcade.

name: Cavern Adventurers
description: Build an underground network of caves in this fantasy-themed management sim.

name: LooperLands
description:
Welcome to LooperLands, the vibrant and ever-expanding cross-chain creator-owned pixelverse, built on Loopring L2, Ethereum L1, IMX, and Taiko, by the LooperLands community.

Immerse yourself in a community-driven MMO experience where over 3000 assets, crafted by a growing community of over 100 passionate artists and creators, come to life. With a player base exceeding 1K active and creators selling over 200K LRC sold on LoopExchange since June 2023, LooperLands is not just a game—it's a thriving metaverse.

name: My Talking Angela 2+
description: This is a port of My Talking Angela 2 exclusively for Apple Arcade that removes all the ads and microtransactions.

name: RealDoom
description:
After the Columbine High School massacre, it was reported by various news sources that one of the perpetrators, Eric Harris, had created multiple WADs for the game Doom II. While many of them have been archived and preserved, some of them have not.

One of the lost ones is titled "RealDoom", which is rumored to be a full recreation of Columbine High School. It has been stated on page 7043 of the Columbine Report that Eric had said that he had made a level WAD that is a recreation of the high school, however if it is RealDoom or not is unconfirmed.

name: Pokémath!
description: Pokémath! is an educational math game based on the Pokémon series. The game features 5 levels, which increases the difficulty of the questions per level. After each level, you gain a new Pokémon.

name: Taiwan 2013
description: Taiwan 2013 is a parody game of Hong Kong 97 and Taiwan 2001 that's based around Ma Ying-jeou, the president of Taiwan at the time. The game was released for browsers and mobile.

name: Emoji-Connect
description: The aim of the game is to score as many points as possible by mixing emojis of the same type before time runs out. When two emojis are combined, you get time. The bigger the combination, the more time you get. This way, the best players can extend the game indefinitely.

name: Solares
description: Test your puzzle solving skills in the grid-based city of Solares. Move boxes to their colored locations by using switches and devices with new mechanics.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 1
description: Targeting Maths Lab 1 is the second entry of the Targeting Maths series of educational games, which is targeted towards kids aged from 6 to 7.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 2
description: Targeting Maths Lab 2 is an educational game made to teach Australian kids math.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 3
description: Targeting Maths Lab 3 is an educational math game compilation made for kids aged 8-9.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 4
description: Targeting Maths Lab 4 is an educational maths game developed for kids aged 9-10.

name: Targeting Maths Lab 6
description: Targeting Maths Lab 6 is the final entry in the Targeting Maths series.

name: Targeting Maths Lab Launch Pad
description: Targeting Maths Lab Launch Pad is the first game in the Targeting Maths educational series of games.

name: The Crackpet Show: Happy Tree Friends Edition
description: The Crackpet Show is an action-packed rogue-lite shoot'em-up about mutated animals that fight in a bizarre TV show, crushing their opponents with a variety of weapons. Choose your beastie, gear ‘em up, and go kill your enemies in the name of fame and sweet sponsorship deals!

name: Bowling
description: Sin descripción

name: Pac-Man
description: A LCD mini-arcade port of the original Pac-Man that bundled in with Monopoly Arcade: Pac-Man.

name: Palps
description: Palps is a cancelled Famicom Disk System game. The game would have involved a mixture of programming and gameplay. It is believed that the player would have not have been controlled by themselves, but rather that the player would program how they react to other things around them.

name: SuperSquad.GG
description:
Get ready for an epic adventure where you must fight off hordes of monsters and create your Super Squad with unique abilities to defeat them!

Explore different environments as you battle through waves of monsters. Use your deck to strategically choose the best squad of heroes to take on each challenge and defeat the most imposing foes.

name: Jump Burger
description: Jump Burger is a rumored Nintendo Entertainment System game. It is believed that the game would become part of the game ShortOrder & Eggsplode.

name: 1000 Best Solitaire Games
description: 1000 Best Solitaire Games is a PC compilation game which contains 1000 variations of Solitaire.

name: Monopoly Sudoku
description: Monopoly Sudoku is a mobile game that combines the board game Monopoly with the game Sudoku.

name: Long
description: Sin descripción

name: Pain is the Best Medicine
description:
Life as a university student is nothing but smooth sailing… until you wake up in the hospital after being hit by a car. You’ve got some broken bones, but it’s not all bad, as your attending nurse turns out to be your favorite childhood babysitter, Lilia.

Unfortunately, she’s too busy to spend much time with you, so you sneak out and follow her. That’s when you stumble onto a dark secret… It seems all the nurses in this hospital are actually sadists! Can you escape with your dignity intact or will you submit to your deepest desires?

name: Play for Love
description: You're a high school student with exceptional athletic abilities who's wanted by all the sports clubs at school. But this year, you don't want to spend your days sweating in the summer heat—instead, you want a relaxing year and a girlfriend. That all goes out the window, however, when you accidentally injure a member of the baseball team, which leads to you subbing in as a replacement. Your outstanding performance ends up attracting the attention of the other team managers, who immediately ask you to join their clubs. You decline their offers, but what will you do when these beautiful managers waste no time in asking you out in return for playing for them?

name: A Witch in Time: Yamada-kun to Nananin no Majo
description: At Suzaku High School, there has been generation after generation of witches that hold special powers. Ryu Yamada holds the special power to copy a witch's power and he's been using this to solve the many issues that pop-up at the school. One day, Ryu and his friends are hanging out at the Occult Club as usual. But when Miyabi brings up a rumor involving time travel, Ryu brushes it off as being unrelated to witches and their powers. On the way home from school, just outside the gates, Ryu feels someone tap on his shoulder. He turns around, but there's nobody there. Thinking it must have been his imagination, he continues on his way home only to find his house is gone! It turns out, he's travelled in time!

name: Fragile Ascent
description: Team up with a friend to build the tallest, most precarious tower imaginable.

name: Anime Hero Zero
description: Anime Hero Zero is an unofficial modded version of Guitar Hero II for the PlayStation 2 which adds anime songs into the game.

name: One Shot Gladiator
description: Top down arena shooter. You can pick up different weapons and health packs, but you can only use them once.

name: Anime Hero Zero 2
description: Anime Hero Zero 2 is an unofficial Guitar Hero II mod for the PlayStation 2 which adds anime music. The game is a sequel to Anime Hero Zero.

name: Anime Hero Zero 3
description: Anime Hero Zero 3 is an unofficial Guitar Hero II mod for the PlayStation 2 which adds anime music. The game is the third entry to the Anime Hero Zero series.

name: Aquatic Adventure
description: Talk with a cast of colorful characters and play minigames to save a flooded town.

name: Blank Relish
description: A struggle for survival and finding purpose amidst the isolation of an unknown planet.

name: Ace Angler
description: A little fishing game for the Playdate.

name: Anti Aircraft Artillery
description: A turret-based, arcade-style shooter where you try to defend yourself from an endless attack of kamikaze planes.

name: Distill, My Beating Heart!
description: Sin descripción

name: Reboot Heroes
description: Assemble a team of androids to take down the AI overlord in this rogue-lite, card-drafting, auto-battle adventure! Each Hero brings a unique card-pool and will help you master the elements of this augmented world.

name: VPet-Simulator
description: VPet is a desktop pet software that supports various interactive. it is open source, free and support Steam workshops.

name: Lunch with Ronan
description: Lunch with Ronan is a NSFW standalone side story of Notes of Hearts, where you take on the role of Ronan's co-worker.

name: Zanac
description: A mobile phone port of the Famicom Disk System game Zanac.

name: Dirt 5: Wild Spirits Content Pack
description: Continue your journey in the DIRT Off-Road Series with the Wild Spirits Content Pack - with new cars, Career events, sponsors and customisation items!

name: Bootleg Soldier Azure: Astral Rave
description:
Bootleg Soldier Azure: Astral Rave stars one-time wonder Yuuto Ichika in her quest to get her cookbook back while shooting down everything that tries to stop her in this fast-paced shoot 'em up!

This game was made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #9, and is a fan work of LAME Dimension's characters and games!

name: Ganso Hanjuku Hero
description: For the 20th Anniversary of the franchise, Square Enix released a remake of the original Hanjuku Hero for mobile devices.

name: Dirt 5: Uproar Content Pack
description:
The quartet of cars coming to DIRT 5 in the Uproar Content Pack restore four of the most exciting and eye-catching machines from our previous extreme off-road title, DiRT Showdown.

First up, the Duke Coupe – a powerful long-wheelbase car with hot rod stylings and huge tyres, ready to conquer DIRT 5’s routes in its own unique style from the Rally GT Class. In the RallyCross class, meanwhile, the Zenden Cup is a perfect addition, with its compact boxy chassis and aerodynamic flair housing a powerful engine – the ideal mix of speed and handling for our off-road events. The Jackson Adventurer, meanwhile, is a bigger beast for the Unlimited Class that’s low on the unnecessary extras and big on shock absorbers, suspension and speed for those big jumps. Finally, the Jackson Eulogy – the most unique of our new cars, with an estate chassis decked out with custom details and performance upgrades, dropping into our Classic Rally class.

Each of the four cars will feature in a new thread of 25 Career events for all players to take on, available in the new ‘Uproar’ option in Career. Every event either takes place at night-time or features dynamically changing weather that includes night racing, meaning a fresh test of your nerve, reaction and skill. The 25 events will take you across the globe in new race scenarios for New York, Nepal, Italy, South Africa and more locations.

Two new sponsors are also added into Career mode in the Uproar Content Pack: PUMA and OffRoad Xtreme. Race through Career events when signed to these sponsors to unlock new items, including unique liveries, player profile options and custom livery patterns, to show your style on the track.

name: Afterlife Airlines
description: Help Jules look for his cat Parsnip, in the airport between Life and Death!

name: 5-fun go ni Igai na Ketsumatsu: Monochrome no Toshokan
description: The game features 100 game-original stories with unique graphics and sounds, described as sometimes fun, other times scary, and occasionally moving. Each story can be completed in five minutes and ends with an unexpected twist. The stories available to read are determined by speaking to the game’s two librarians—the angelic Whi and devilish Lack—allowing you to forge your own story depending on what kind of conversations you have.

name: Martial Beat 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Rug Rats
description: You have to eliminate some pests while vacuuming the floor.

name: Ticket To Ride: First Class Pack
description: Discover Ticket to Ride First Class Pack, an expansion bundle for Ticket to Ride including all maps, and face new challenges with your friends! With this bundle, receive 9 maps and travel around the world. From Switzerland to the Legendary Asia, play with new mechanics : Stock Shares system, technology, tunnels, ferries, and more!

name: Trion
description: Shooter game

name: Irekae IQ Crossword
description:
For crossword fans who are tired of ordinary crosswords!
If you know the words that enter each square from the hint of the vertical and horizontal key, replace the letters. It's a new sense crossword puzzle that just replaces characters.

If multiple words are completed with a single replacement, you will get a high score! In addition, the player's IQ level will be judged according to the time required to clear and the score.

The lovely picture with the theme of 10 regions around the world and the pleasure of being able to speak one after another with easy operation will definitely make you addicted ♪

Let's play with 3 types of modes.
There are three types of game modes: "World Mode" that clears the stage within the time limit, "IQ judgment mode" that judges the player's IQ level, and "Free Mode" that you can play carefully without worrying about the time limit.

Also, in the "Records" on the menu screen, you can check game results such as "IQ test results" and "high score".

Get a high score with various techniques!

You can solve crosswords just by replacing the characters, but the score fluctuates greatly depending on how you solve it!

Aim for a high score by making full use of various techniques unique to "IQ crossword" such as "pair line" that completes two lines at the same time, "cross line" that completes lines at the same time, and "combo" of continuous correct answers. Let's stay!

name: Irekae IQ Crossword DX
description:
"If you replace the letters, the words will be completed!!" This is the second new type crossword puzzle will make you feel addicted!

This time, while keeping the simple and easy-to-understand rules, you can enjoy it, such as increasing the number of problems and adding a national ranking function!!

In addition, the voice of the characters is included, and they support and liven up in various scenes. The comical degree and cuteness are doubled!

The number of problems is also greatly increased!

There are three types of game modes: "World Mode" that clears the stage within the time limit, "IQ Test Mode" that determines the player's IQ level, and "Free Mode" that solves problems without worrying about the time limit.

The number of recorded questions has been doubled compared to the previous work, and you can now play crosswords until you are satisfied!

Test your skills with players from all over the country!
If you send data of the score in "World Mode" and the IQ index in "IQ Test Mode", you can participate in each national ranking.

There are 3 types of rankings, "1 day", "monthly" and "total" with different aggregation periods, so if you get good results, register more and more data and aim for the top!

name: Target Rush
description: A bite-sized platformer where you have to break as many targets as you can within the time limit.

name: Deathbound
description: Death needs a replacement. You're just the Grunt for the job. But unfortunately you're not the only grunt fighting for Death's job. Perseverance, quick reflexes and a quick trigger finger are the only thing that will help you survive. Reach the 13th Depth and defeat Death to Win!

name: Klub '99
description: A Bouncer Simulation game inspired by Papers Please where you must check ID's at the door. Look out for Drunks, Underage drinkers, Fake or expired ID's!

name: Suicide Simulator
description: You are alone on a beach with suicidal thoughts, there is nothing left for you in this world. End your life using a variety of different tools and methods.

name: Fortune Hunter
description: You are out treasure hunting.

name: Celestial Ascent
description: A safe-for-work visual novel set in the near future. Featuring four protagonists, the group uncovers the past and fights against an inevitable future.

name: Maou Company
description:
It is a role-playing game where Loki, the lower-class demon and the main character, aims for heaven with three of his friends in order to solve the mystery of the item "Pendulum" given to him by his uncle. If you save money during the adventure, you can exchange "engagement (contract)" with ancient demons with the power of the pendulum. The main characters can acquire various "skills" according to "form points (like experience points)" from the demons who have been engaged. By acquiring skills according to the purpose, it is possible to advance the battle with the enemy advantageously.
In addition, the "navigation function" that plays an instructive role of the screen the player is looking at can also be activated with the push of a button, so even beginners in role-playing games can enjoy it with confidence!

name: Sky And Earth
description: Sin descripción

name: Majoukko Princess - Mefi's Great Strategy for Recapturing the Castle-
description:
The demon king and the hero are reversed!? Take back the castle that was stolen in the brain battle! An action puzzle game with the princess of the devil castle "Mefi" as the main character.

The stage of the story is after the ending of a role-playing game...

Mefi, the last boss, was defeated by a hero party with an average level of 50 and was kicked out of the devil's castle. Mefi, who has lost her magical power, summons her wisdom, traps humans, and aims for revenge with the hero!

Will Mefi be able to regain the demon castle stolen by the brave!?

Let's use the tricks in the stage well! The inside of the magic castle starts from the castle gate and is divided into sections such as the armory and the magic laboratory. Mefi, who can't use magic, aims to clear it by carrying a wooden box to make a scaffold, and using gimmicks placed in the stage such as Tsurugiyama and punching gloves.

Pay attention to the event scene full of stories! The event scene inserted before the middle boss war is full of gags and stories based on the promise of the role-playing game!

If you like games, please enjoy the unique dialogue between Mefi and the heroes, which will make you grin involuntarily.

Let's complete the "Portrait of the Demon Tribe"! If you get orbs or treasure chests that appear on a specific stage, you can regain the demon friends captured by the hero and the stolen treasure, and the title screen will change more and more.

At first, it's a lonely portrait of only Mefi, but let's proceed with the game and make it more and more lively!

name: No Internet
description: This game is based upon the dinosaur jumping over cacti game which one gets in the web browser Google Chrome which can be played when there is no internet connection available.

name: OneBit Jetpack
description: A little high score game for the Playdate inspired by the 80s classic Jetpac.

name: OneBit Demon Attack
description: A little Playdate game inspired by the Atari classic.

name: Dandy Boy Halloween Adventure
description: Standalone DLC of Dandy Boy adventures where our main characters get stranded without gas during a road trip near an abandoned mansion, deciding to explore it supernatural things start to happen, and it's up to our Dandy boy to help his friends and learn the mysterious past of this mansion

name: Bifusion
description: Playdate game that mixes the gameplay of Puzzle Bobble with 2048.

name: Bubbly Letters
description: An arcade puzzle word-building game for the Playdate.

name: Blocksy
description: A little combo puzzle game for Playdate.

name: Horizontal
description: A short horror experience for the Playdate.

name: Our Cinderella
description: A texting and stat simulator visual novel about an anxious millennial getting ready to go to a Christmas party while chatting with his childhood friends. He has the ability to attend the party with one of three love interests.

name: Dark Souls: Archthrones
description: Dark Souls: Archthrones is a fan-made mod for Dark Souls that aims to enhance and expand the original game. It introduces new content, such as additional weapons, armour, spells, and items. The mod also rebalances gameplay elements, updates enemy placements, and adds new areas to explore.

name: In the Grace of Our Malice
description:
Bee receives a call from a friend in need. They're estranged, but there's a bond that won't go away; for better and for worse.

In the Grace of our Malice is an old-school, linear Visual Novel made in roughly a week by kiri and merengedoll.

name: Cooking Academy 3: Recipe for Success
description: Return to your roots and learn new dishes in Cooking Academy 3 - Recipe for Success, a delicious sequel to the hit series. After winning one million dollars and opening a restaurant, the time has come to write your very own cookbook. To make it a bestseller however, it will take many new recipes. Thankfully, you have your old professor Henri Fromage and his friends to help.

name: Dreamy Idea
description: DREAMY IDEA is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Salma, an artist who falls into dreams while searching for ideas. The goal of the game is to explore the dream world and collect effects.

name: Just Dance.exe
description:
Just Dance.exe is a free PC-exclusive fangame made from scratch. With content made by fans like fanmades, mashups, and original maps, with the aim of making their creations playable and reaching more people.

You can play new exclusive game modes, with which you will discover new ways to dance while having fun with your friends.

name: Where are You?
description: You're 7 years old, and you can't find your big sister. Search the house and collect the four parts of her diary, to find out where she is.

name: The Valley
description:
Find treasure fight monsters

Based on the type-in game from the April 1982 edition of Computing Today.

name: Dwarf
description:
You are a dwarf on a mission to mine as much gold as possible. You start your day deep down in the mines when suddenly... lava starts bursting from the exit above.

The only way to survive, is to go down! How deep can you go ?

name: Space Cactus Canyon
description:
The year is 2543. You are the last cactus on Earth.

You live in the scorching deserts of the Rocky Mountains in what used to be Alberta, Canada. The heat is nearly unbearable and wildfires are common. The rest of your fellow cacti have moved to a more temperate climate ... on Mars. They have sent a final spaceship to transport you there.

Reaching it won’t be easy. Water has become Earth’s most precious resource, and although you are a cactus, you need every drop. You’ll collect the water as you move through the canyons on your way to rendezvous with your rocket. Every so often, you’ll even find a bucket of water, and you’ll be able rest for the night.

But watch out for the humans. The few that remain after World War XII think they need the water even more than you. And they’ll do anything to protect it.

name: Magical Fantasista II
description:
The long-awaited second installment of the Magical Synthetic Role Playing "Magical Fantasista" series!

Kamui Mel Yuturna, an honor student at the Imperial Academy of Magic, was involved in a big incident in the middle of the final assignment at the end of the school year, and started the adventure of solving the case ... We will confront the crisis of the Nebula country while increasing the magic level by synthesis of magic obtained with warts from the field and enemies, and testing in the dojo. Expand the popular skill system in the previous work, and you can enjoy multiple training depending on the equipment according to the abilities of each of the three people with different magical attributes, and you can fight with characteristics. Enjoy the magnificent world of Magical Fantasista in all 10 dungeons.

name: Kelly Kangaroo
description:
Kelly the kangaroo is enjoying a lovely picnic date with Rosie the rabbit in the picturesque Mossy Valley when - Oh no! The mad scientist Contemptus Mundy, always bitter and jealous of the happy people living on Gaia Gaia Island, has kidnapped Rosie and locked her away in his motherbase in the clouds! It's up to you to help Kelly save her sweetheart before it's too late and that vile Contemptus whisks her away to the stars.

Use the joystick to make Kelly hop to the left or right, and hold the fire button to perform a much higher jump to reach her goal. Contemptus Mundy's mothership has one weakness in it's anti affection forcefields and that is the prisoner's favorite food. In this case, strawberries! Kelly must collect six strawberries scattered around the obstacle course in order to free Rosie from her lame and apathetic captor.

Kelly will face many dangers along the way, from angry bees, carniverous flowers, agressive bats and automatic flying saucer drones. Most can be knocked out simply by jumping on them, but some are especially treacherous... watch out! If Kelly falls victim to these baddies, she will be knocked back several screens, losing precious time.

name: Pawnchline
description:
Display your best stand-up comedy routines in the most famous bar in town, the "Pawnchline".

Use your joke cards to find the type of humor that best suits your audience, and make them laugh. But bear in mind, each session has its new outlandish audience, with different humor preferences.

name: The Radio Chaser
description: Go recover your radio from the blob thingys on an andventure around multiple locations!

name: Game-No-Watch Ball
description: A port of the 1980 Game and Watch game Ball - without the watch.

name: Taco Tides
description: Captain George and his crew of daring cats embark on a taco-filled odyssey, encountering treacherous waters, dastardly duck foes, and a grand admiral with a quacking secret. As you navigate the Taco Tides, you'll sail, shoot, and solve the mystery of disappearing tacos in this purrfectly hilarious and action-packed game.

name: 240p Test Suite
description: The 240p test suite is a homebrew software suite for video game consoles developed to help in the evaluation of capture cards, upscalers, upscan converters, line doublers and of course TV processing of 240p video and scaled signals.

name: Intruder
description:
You are home alone at night, and someone had just broken into your house.

Find the intruder.

name: Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku 3 - Sekai Taikai-hen
description:
Sub-characters can also change clothes!? Let's enjoy the even more evolved "Shizuku World"!!
Tokyo in the early summer of 2XX9, one year after the world expedition.

Shizuku Asagiri, the captain of the Aoo High School beach volleyball club, was practicing hard every day with Suzu Kamishima, a junior who is small but has a great sense of volleyball.

It was a pair of Shizuku & Bells who challenged the preliminary round of the world tournament looking forward to the reunion with Haruna, a former partner and Shizuku's best friend, but what was waiting for the two there ......!?

The days of hot and brilliant games will start again!!

There are up to 16 characters in the series! In addition to the nostalgic characters that appeared in "1" and "2", you can also see new characters!

In this game, you can switch the operation characters during the game, and you can choose and play your favorite character in the "World Tour Mode" that wins all 4 races!

The story changes depending on the result of the game and how the adventure part proceeds. Once the scenario is cleared, you can play it again from any point.

The combination technique explodes! In addition to the special spikes that accumulate and hit the power gauge, the strongest special move "Combination Technique" released in cooperation with pair characters has been newly added.

When the gauge bar becomes MAX and is in the flashing state, it is activated with the receive of the pair character, and if you hit the ball with a special spike, it will be a super powerful spike.
Please use the spikes according to the war situation to advance the game advantageously and grasp the victory!

In addition, in addition to collecting familiar swimsuits and character profiles, it is full of fun and highlights that are not limited to collection elements, such as the release of "Haruna's Blog".

name: Thoughtform Invasion
description:
In THOUGHTFORM INVASION you need to try to fall asleep, while being harassed by [REDACTED]. The more you think about them, the more likely they are to materialize.

Use your flashlight to scare them away, close your eyes and get a good nights rest. And brace yourself if you decide to open your eyes.

name: Horké Léto 2
description: It is a point-and-click adventure with hand-paintend graphics and focused on (not always) logical puzzles, funny minigames and crazy humor. It takes place in the Wild West. It´s the second game in the series.

name: Frantic
description: 1st person space shooter

name: Moe Slot Beach no Shizuku
description:
Put out the enchanted "777" with your fingers! The beach fairies produce a full-fledged casino-style slot game with bonus elements such as "JACK POT" and "FACTOR" in a refreshing and lovely way! "Shizuku" and "Haruna" of "Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku" will be very active here and there in the game, such as navigating and directing a jackpot.

In the game, it is equipped with a "tutorial" that explains the rules in an easy-to-understand manner, and a "autoplay" function that automatically bets coins and keeps turning the reels. In addition, if you meet certain conditions, the number of "Haruna" costumes will increase, and you can enjoy dressing up.

There is no doubt that you will be addicted to the complete costume added to the game that can be easily played with simple operation!!

name: Holo X Break
description: Fight your way through endless waves of holoX's minions! Gear up with all sorts of equipment and items in this action packed beat-em-up to reach the 5 bosses of hololive's "holoX", and put a stop to their plans!

name: Mystia2
description:
"mystia2" consists of three chapters, and the party changes for each chapter. The first part and the second part 2 apps together are about 500KB, and you can enjoy the world view of "mystia" more deeply in a large volume scenario.

It is a variety of storylines such as 32 kinds of magic, more than 100 kinds of monsters, and field dungeons on 20 maps, but also emphasizes operability. With an automatic save system that automatically saves even if the game is interrupted, and a memo system that allows you to remember where to go next, RPG beginners are also safe. In addition, we have introduced a treasure collection system, so you can enjoy treasure hunting in a vast map along with the progress of the story.

"mystia2" is a fantasy RPG set on the continent of Mystia, one year after the previous work "mystia".

In this work, which consists of all three chapters, the party changes for each chapter.
A large volume of scenarios around the "King's Sword" left by the gods and the "Masty Stone" that manipulates the gods
You can enjoy the world view of "mystia" drawn with gentle colors more deeply.

Like the previous work, it is equipped with convenient functions such as a memo function and an automatic save system. There are also plenty of rushing elements such as the treasure collection system and "from the beginning as it is strong" that comes out after clearing.

Let's use a wide variety of magic and challenge ourselves to fight against monsters who block our way.

name: Legally Distinct, Planetary Based, Suika Game Clone
description: Merge the planets to increase your score, keep merging to increase your combo and multiply your points beyond the stars.

name: Flyhight Cloudia IV - Eien no Kizuna
description:
The Flyhight Cloudia series, which is popular as a full-fledged mobile RPG. The latest work "Flyhight Cloudia 4" is a scenario RPG that depicts the mystery of mysterious events that began to happen one after another in the empty world "Cloudia" and the bonds of the people involved in it.

Event scenes with beautiful graphics are included everywhere in the magnificent story. You will be drawn into that dramatic development involuntarily. In addition, there are some "special skills" that player characters learn that can only be obtained by generating events!

A combat system that emphasizes the ease of playing with mobile phones. The combat system pursues the ease of play unique to mobile phones and adopts the multi-weight battle that has been inherited in the Fly Height Claudia series. With easy operation, you can enjoy highly strategic battles.
In addition, there is also a convenient "AUTO" mode without the hassle of command input, so you can quickly battle with lower-rated enemies!!
Game screenGame screen. There are also a lot of rushing elements.

The collection of familiar hidden dungeons and air crests through the series is of course alive and well! In addition, new challenging elements such as "Arena", "Battle Graph" where you can fight past enemies, and mini events other than the main scenario will appear, and you can play for a long time after clearing.

name: Angélica no Reino Animal
description: Go on an adventure with Angélica and learn all the secrets of the fascinating animal kingdom. You'll get to see new animals, explore wild places and have lots of fun.

name: Kamura: Kamigami to Chigiri Shisha
description:
