Kamura - Kamigami to Chigiri Shisha - is a Japanese-style fantasy RPG that depicts a magnificent story of gods and humans on the stage of "the country of sunrise". In order to stop my brother who fell into darkness, make a contract with 8 million gods who exist in various places and hit the darkness with the ultimate secret technique!!

A shocking and moving story!
In addition to familiar gods and monsters such as "Amaterasu" and "Tsukuyomi", there are items that you have heard at least once, such as the three sacred treasures, appear everywhere! A story of laughter and tears, shock and excitement by attractive friends unfolds.

A system that boosts battles! The "God Drop" system that allows you to use unique secret techniques by possessing the gods to yourself, and the "Gogyo Soi-Oi" system, which changes damage depending on the attributes of the gods possessed by the characters and the attributes of enemies, etc., make the strategy of the battle. I'll increase it more.

It's also full of rushing elements! In addition to various weapons and monsters that appear in the game, there are also plenty of collection elements that complete the picture book by encountering gods! Various rushing elements are prepared, such as dungeons that appear only under specific conditions.

After clearing, there will be further adventures... If you meet certain conditions, the following three sacred treasures will appear on the title screen, and you can play the bonus elements by collecting all of them

name: Krull
description: Action tie-in with the movie of the same name.

name: Rougien
description: Space Shooter

name: Change Lanes
description: Racing game

name: Pentapus
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball Super Card Game Fusion World
description: Dragon Ball Super Card Game Fusion World is a trading card game where you battle players with Leader cards and supportive Battle cards in order to drain the opponents life points to 0 and win the game.

name: Super Hero Sakusen
description: Super Hero Sakusen is a turn-based RPG crossover between the Gundam, Ultra Man, and Metal Heroes series as well as various other Toei-owned tokusatsu TV shows such as Kaiketsu Zubatto.

name: Izumi Jiken File Vol. 1 - Shiosai-hen
description:
A visual novel-style detective game released for Japanese mobile phones. Originally debuting in 2002, it was rereleased on May 1, 2006 with updated graphics as Izumi Jiken File Vol. 1 - Shiosai-hen Deluxe Edition.

You can easily feel like a detective by reading a novel!
"Mystery Adventure Izumi Case File - Shiosai Edition" (hereinafter referred to as Izumi Case File) is a mystery adventure game that "deduces the criminal" based on the situation at the crime scene and the information collected by asking.

name: Hello Kitty Mahjong
description: A Hello Kitty themed game of Mahjong. Can you find all the matching tiles before time runs out?

name: Crusader Kings III: Wards & Wardens
description: Many new education events add greater depth to the training of the young people of court. Educating the children of the court is now more interactive for both formal tutoring and the ever important life lessons. Shape not just the abilities, but the personality of your young charges, steering them to more acceptable or desirable traits for the important role they will play in the future.

name: Izumi Jiken File Vol. 2 - Tasogare-hen
description:
You can easily feel like a detective by reading a novel! Following the first "Shiosai Edition" set in Kamakura, the second "Izumi Incident File - Twilight Edition" will be set in Kansai. The player becomes the main character "Izumi" and deduces the culprit based on the situation of the crime scene and the information collected in the interview.

Originally released in 2003 for Japanese mobile phones, a "Deluxe Edition" with updated graphics followed on August 7, 2006.

name: Bricks
description: Bricks is a very simple Breakout clone with CGA graphics made by Vince Bly for DOS in 1984.

name: Izumi Jiken File Vol. 3 - Yujuku-hen
description:
The third popular detective adventure!
It is a detective adventure game where you can easily feel like a detective like reading a novel. Following the first "Shiosai Edition" on Kamakura and the second Kansai "Twilight Edition", the third "Yujuku Hen" will be set in Kagoshima, Kyushu. The player becomes the main character, a young editor "Izumi", and deduce the culprit based on the situation at the crime scene and the information collected in the interview. This "Yujuku Edition" is also actually on location in Kagoshima, and it is a full-fledged game composition.

Originally released in 2003 for Japanese mobile phones, it was later rereleased in 2007 as a "Deluxe Edition" with updated graphics.

name: Go, Diego, Go! Great Dinosaur Rescue
description:
Team up with Diego and Baby Jaguar on a prehistoric adventure as they travel back in time and help their new friend Maia the Maiasaura find her family. You'll have to climb rock walls, cross monkey bars, solve puzzles and jump on a pogo stick as you explore the wild landscape on this rescue adventure. Can you help your new friend Maia the dinosaur find her way home?

Go Diego Go: Great Dinosaur Rescue lets you travel back in time to the age of dinosaurs on an exciting mission filled with adventure. You'll use your DS stylus to tap on dinosaur footprints, shout into the microphone to speak to the dinosaurs and draw on the touch screen in order to complete 25 adventure mode games and three museum games. Help Diego on his voyage and become a dinosaur rescuer, too.

name: Reaper
description:
Reaper is a medieval-themed first-person shooter, drawing inspiration from such classic titles as Doom, Quake and Hitman.
Play as Death Incarnate, and follow the guidance of a mysterious spirit, tasking you with collecting the souls of a series of targets, and condemning them to the Hell below.

name: Who Wants to Be a Murderer?
description: Who Wants to Be a Murderer? is a psychological horror game set in a TV game show straight out of the 90s. You'll face a series of challenges that will put your morality and sanity to the test.

name: Batsugun
description: Experience the epic conclusion of Toaplan's legendary shooter series with Batsugun including the lauded Special version! Choose your favorite character and spaceship in this thrilling genre-defining bullet-hell action. Now on PC with modern enhancements!

name: Talking ABC's: A Day at the Beach
description: Talking ABC's: A Trip To The Beach is an early spelling game for children 2 to 6 years old. The game uses software called TurboSound to produce voice through the PC speaker, while the vast majority of games required a soundcard. There are three modes of play. In the first mode, the game announces a letter, which the player must find on the keyboard, and then an object that starts with that later is introduced and drawn onto the screen. In the second mode, the player can press any letter and the corresponding object is drawn to the screen, which the player can move wherever they want. In the third mode, three letters and three objects are displayed, and the player must draw a line between the letters and objects to make them match. Registered users received a copy of the game which displayed their child's name, and could request a CGA optimized version which was much faster for CGA users. Additionally, they were promised a free game. Later versions promised a copy of Millions of Mazes, which may or may not have been the original free game.

name: Zombie Crisis
description: Taking place in the not-so-distant future in which the inevitable Zombie War has come to a head. You try and make your way through a downtrodden urban area, fighting through countless zombie hordes just to survive.

name: Dragon x Dragon
description:
The second RPG of the Dragon series!
The long-awaited second installment of the popular Dragon Team Project "Dragon Tower" has appeared. " Dragon x Dragon" is a full-scale training RPG. The stage is a virtual world with the image of medieval Northern Europe, and it is a story that a boy (Willow), a dragon messenger family, grows up with his dragon (Kermes) in order to defeat the dark dragon Genesis, which has thrown the world in chaos. The protagonist's childhood friend and pharmacist apprentice girl (Narin) will cooperate with the growth of the dragon. You can play infinitely in the field dungeon with the automatic generation method.
Features and rules of "Dragon x Dragon"
"Dragon x Dragon" consists of three elements: battle, preparation, and training. The level in this game means the experience value (strength correction in battle) for each dungeon exploration. If you lose the battle or return, the level will return from 1. In addition, by "nurturing" the dragon (Kermes) with a medicine made by "conconsulation", it will increase its status (HP, speed, attack, defense) and gradually grow stronger and stronger.

name: Dragon x Dragon DX
description: You can enjoy "Dragon x Dragon" with brilliant graphics and sound unique to the 5x series.

name: Pikmin 2 Lands of Torture
description: A kaizo hack for Pikmin 2 with brutally challenging area and cave remixes with way too many enemies, made by QuoteBalrog. Good luck.

name: Pikmin 2 Power Cut Blackout
description: A followup/remix to Pikmin 2 Power Cut, with remixed areas, enemies, caves and treasures, new captain models, and plenty more difficulty. Made by Nintendocluber

name: BoKe Travelog
description: BoKe Travelog was a PC browser game released exclusively in China that bares many similarities to the game Poptropica.

name: Star Sentry
description: Horizontal space shooter

name: Dragon x Dragon: Complete Version
description: Finally, a complete version with all the initial concepts of "Dragon x Dragon" is now available. In the full version, in addition to beautiful graphics, we realized the addition of a new mini-game floor, the upgrade of the combat system such as the increase of normal attacks that have been one type until now to 3 types by training, and the addition of "smartness" to the training status. I did. You can enjoy the world of "Dragon x Dragon" more deeply through the fun of advancing the adventure while solving the mystery and the active battle scene.

name: T.G.I.F.
description: Party game for 1-4 players.

name: Looper
description: Escape the dungeon using the Looper — a cutting-edge technology that lets you fold the space itself.

name: Cakefoot
description: Cakefoot is an ultra-hard, single-button, minimalist avoid ’em up with natural physics that is simple to learn and difficult to master. The cake moves on a rail – hold to go forward, let go to fall back. If you can navigate the most challenging enemy patterns you’ve ever seen all the way to the end, you’ll be rewarded with – a new, harder difficulty.

name: Idle RPG: The Game is Bugged!
description: This is a pixelized idle RPG produced by Maf Games, creators of Mr. Kim the Mid-Aged Knight.

name: MotoGP 24: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: TopSpin 2K25: Deluxe Edition
description: Fill out your TopSpin 2K25 collection with the Deluxe Edition, including the Under the Lights Pack, New Wave Pack, and the Rookie Rise Pack!

name: Read Only Memories: Neurodiver - Collector's Edition
description: Each copy of the game includes: physical copy of the game on Nintendo Switch/PlayStation 5, art book, NEURODIVER plush, double-sided acrylic charm featuring ES88, prismatic sticker sheet, instruction manual, soundtrack download card, collector’s edition box.

name: Chura-umi Monogatari
description:
"Chura-umi Monogatari" is a sequel to the app "Chura-jima Kurashi" that simulates life on the southern island.

The next stage is a small island "Kotsubu Island" floating in the beautiful sea. The main character will spend 5 days as the caretaker of this island.

On this island surrounded by nature, please deepen exchanges with the residents, enjoy leisure, and find your own way to spend your time!

The story changes with the choice of men and women!
The game starts when the main character saw the article of "Recruitment of Administrators" on the Internet. In this work, you can choose the gender of the main character, and various changes may come depending on various events such as love.

On the island, the daily action time is fixed from 10 o'clock to 18 o'clock, and the time passes depending on the area movement and mini-games. Depending on the situation when you finish the 5-day experience, you will have a different ending.

Every time I play, I discover new things! There are 7 types of mini-games that appear during play, such as "Eisa", "Palm Fruit" and "Snorkeling"! Depending on the change in time and ganju (physical strength), the mini-games you can play may change.

The "achievement rate" will increase due to the progress of mini-games and the collection of illustrated book items. There are also special stories that occur when you master the achievement rate, so please take a walk all over the island!

name: Puzzle Chasers
description: Puzzle Chasers is a puzzle game filled with adventure, mystery, and romance! Someone is stealing the world’s greatest landmarks! Put the pieces together to save them!

name: Unicorn Overlord: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: I*Chu: Chibi Edition
description: Guide 32 aspiring idols towards their ultimate debut. Play rhythm action games to unlock characters and create your own groups. Follow the characters’ journeys through the main story and support them through their struggles!

name: Construction Simulator 4
description: Construction Simulator returns with a map inspired by the Canadian landscape.

name: Boardwalk Arcade 2
description:
Boardwalk Arcade 2 is a sequel to the successful Party Arcade game. Boardwalk Arcade 2 offers a brand-new location on the boardwalk featuring exciting and classic mini games.

Boardwalk Arcade 2 features a collection of games that will be instantly familiar to anyone who’s been to a carnival or boardwalk. The more you play the more tickets you earn towards cosmetic upgrades, figurines, and collectibles!

name: Amerzone: The Explorer's Legacy - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Direct-X
description: Doujin shoot-em-up for the Sharp X68000

name: Keitai Shoujo: Koi+Hime - Koi ni Ochita Cinderella-hime
description:
Mobile phone girl
"Keitai Shoujo: Koi+Hime - Koi ni Ochita Cinderella-hime" is the latest work of the mobile phone girl series with a cumulative total of over 700,000 downloads! It is a sound novel style princess romance adventure game that is also fun in mini-games, adding romantic comedy x suspense x moe to Cinderella, which is famous for Grimm's Fairy Tales that everyone knows.

name: The Gap: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Smurfs: Village Party
description: Papa Smurf has decided to organize an exceptional party! Embark on a party game set in the Smurfs' Village, featuring an adventure mode.

name: Monster Hunter Stories Collection
description: A compilation of the HD port of Monster Hunter Stories and Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin.

name: Too Human
description: What started off as something for the PlayStation and later the GameCube before finally releasing for the Xbox 360.

name: Hyper Turbo Boost
description: Sin descripción

name: Sharpshoot
description: Sin descripción

name: Sherlock Purr 2
description: Join Sherlock Purr on a purrfect adventure!

name: Stop10
description:
STOP10 is an arcade game that mixes fast reflexes with simple sums.

Your objective is to make the counter and the moving number to sum 10. However, the counter is rapidly moving so you'll have to be quick and sharp! The faster you answer, the more points you get!

The counter has a timer which refills when you get a correct answer and drops when you miss. If it drops to 0, it's game over!

name: Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo
description: Are you ready for the first Yoyovania?! In this 2D top-down adventure you'll explore a sprawling urban landscape, reinterpreting your surroundings through your mastery of yoyo tricks. Combine moves for traversal, fight the city's rival crime lords, and regain the influence of the Pipistrello family!

name: Perfect Dark Zero
description: What was originally intended to be a launch title for the GameCube, but Microsoft buyout of Rare resulted in the game’s development being moved to the Xbox, but in the end it became a launch title for the Xbox 360.

name: Hentai Girls: Naughty Gamer
description: Meet over 30 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Stickman Jailbreak 2024
description: Are You Ready to Unlock the Secrets?

name: Oda-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: Eggy Space
description: A light tower defense game with unique planet exploration. Defend against aliens, collect resources, and build a new home. Exquisite graphics and challenges await!

name: Opps! They Love Me Way Too Much!
description: You'll immerse yourself in first-person perspective, encountering four boys with diverse personalities and appearances, embarking on various sweet love stories with them. The aloof boss, the gentle neighbor, the adorable coffeeboy, or the platonic friend? Among them, who will be your final choice?

name: Abyss and Dungeon
description: "Abyss and Dungeon" is a fantasy adventure fighting game.

name: Wuxia: Founding Schools
description: "Wuxia: Founding Schools" is a Chinese-style martial arts card game. Players can create sects, train heroes, build decks, and create unique cards and styles using different effects. It's all about drawing and playing cards!

name: Your Majesty
description: Enter your name and start your own dynasty. Rule your empire and choose between developing technology or culture, governing diligently or lazily. Through a series of memorials and decisions, you will determine the fate of your nation.

name: Parkour Every Day
description: A side-scrolling parkour game with a high level of difficulty.

name: Lonely Journey
description: This is a 2d side-scrolling game similar to (Ori and the Blind Forest) and (Hollow Knight), embark on an adventure in this fantasy land, collect key items, buy powerful equipment, gather pets to fight together, 100+ elves will participate in the battle, and 30+ costumes to help in the battle

name: Home Simulator
description: A relatively casual and free exploration game, where you will be exploring a villa. Most of the items in the house are interactive, and you can freely make a mess in the house!

name: Dog Brew
description: Dog Brew - a light indie adventure where the main character, burdened by debts, decides to settle them through the art of brewing beer.

name: Telejogo
description: Telejogo was a dedicated Pong clone home video game console made by the Brazilian subsidiary of Philco-Ford in 1977. It includes three games and is widely considered to be the first home console to be produced in the country.

name: Flikk
description: A fast-paced precision platformer where your aim is to reach the goal by toggling objects on and off.

name: Nientum: Opus Zero
description: Nientum - Opus Zero is a 2D action game that brings platformer, runner and music interactive genre all together. A fantastic journey of the director and singer, and the storytelling of music from the world. Run through the stage to complete their fate!

name: Sire
description: Sire is a narrative card game about the complicated relationship with parents, and dealing with their inevitable death. Combine cards to explore a darkly comedic, surreal world.

name: Electric Alps
description: You are an electrician, moving back to your hometown in the Austrian Alps, which you find lacks a certain... spark. Promptly tasked with wiring up the village, you solve electrical puzzles, blow fuses and master real-world circuitry techniques. Electrify the Alps, one circuit at a time.

name: Knightborn
description: Be a Warrior, Mage, Archer, or Priest and rise as Knightborn! Explore a hand-painted world, loot enemies, and adventure with friends. Reconnect with classic RPG magic!

name: Data Rush: La Course Aux Données
description: Data Rush: The Data Race is an educational 2D adventure video game about the world of DATA. Take control of a customizable avatar and traverse crazy levels packed with original characters and mini-games, to become the master of digital data !

name: Pew Pew vs. Monsters
description: Pew Pew vs Monsters is an action-packed arena shooter with roguelike elements. Play as a seasoned monster slayer, blast your way through hordes of fast enemies and improve your skills in order to confront the mother of all monsters.

name: Polyzone
description: "Polyzone" is a dynamic war zone where strategy, skill and style collide. Enter the polygonal battlefield, customize your loadout, and join the epic multiplayer experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Get the demo for free now and become the best futuristic warrior!

name: Katana Dynasty
description: Every decision you make shapes the destiny of Kaito and the fate of the city. Will you choose the path of honor, exposing the truth and restoring justice, or succumb to the allure of power and manipulation?

name: Russian Hut Simulator
description: An interactive tour of a traditional wooden hut.

name: Miracle Corp.
description: Miracle Corp. is a metagame and a Metroidvania game. In the story, you will play a mysterious retro game developed by Miracle Corp., guided by an AI tour guide. Uncover the hidden truths behind the game.

name: Search of the Source
description: Search of the Source is an exciting role-playing game in which you take on the role of a young squire venturing into a dangerous and mysterious magical forest. You have to complete many different tasks, explore mysterious places and fight mystical enemies.

name: Contract & Control
description: Embark on an electrifying journey in a role-playing extravaganza with mind-bending features that'll whisk you to new realms! Get ready for an adventure that'll leave you breathless and craving more! Brace yourself, this game may actually blow your mind!

name: Huedini
description: Huedini is a top-down action roguelike game. Play as Huedini, a powerful wizard with the ability to change his colour. By matching your colour, to that of the enemies you can absorb their colour essence. By combining these colour essences into the correct combination, you can cast custom spells.

name: HealQuest
description: Discover a paradise island in VR with HealQuest. Trigger exercises as you explore, and play with the adorable inhabitants to progress. An immersive sports adventure awaits you.

name: RetroFight
description: RetroFight is a multiplayer turn-based strategy game for up to 6 players, in which each action change impacts your next turn retroactively. Play games full of twists and become the master of retroactivity!

name: CDZ
description: Have you ever wanted an apocalypse to happen just so you could snoop through your neighbors belongings? CDZ aims to create a more realistic survival horror game based off real earth data and landmarks. Can you make it across the entire planet?

name: Antidote City Hall
description: You play as a former policeman who founded a private detective agency. Investigate a chain of mysterious murders, plunge into the world of crime, gain former glory, restore your good name. An exciting storyline, explore the city, a lot of characters, an atmosphere of fear and hopelessness.

name: Lost Beacon
description: Experience the thrill of guiding Brutus, a courageous Siberian Husky, across treacherous frozen lakes, hazardous cliffsides, and dark caverns of the Alaskan wilderness as you help him reunite with his team of sled dogs in Lost Beacon, the breathtaking 3D puzzle platformer from Black Banshee Studios.

name: Power of Petanque
description:
A druidic and magical adaptation of pétanque. Compete against your friends!
Compete against your friends in the traditional sport of petanque to determine who is the master of petanque.

name: Monster Typer Backspace
description: Monsters. Typing. Earth-3.

name: Grid Dungeons
description: A turn-based strategy game. Command a team with swordsmen, archers, and mages, strategically navigating grid maps. Unleash unique actions to defeating enemies. Master tactics, minimize damage, and conquer in this immersive strategy adventure.

name: Jack Styler
description: Former FBI agent and fishing enthusiast, faces an alien-zombie apocalypse after a virus escapes from NASA. Determined to rescue his wife, he defies the FBI and embarks alone to confront the threat. An epic rescue mission filled with action and suspense!

name: Point4Point
description: point4point is a rather dark adventure game. Games are created using RPG maker MV and there are no major difficulties in operating the game. In the game you can meet different types of monsters. The player must escape from it by avoiding elements that aim at the main character and hinder him.

name: Cyclic Warriors
description: Cyclic Warriors is a movement shooter focused on time travel and speed. Wall-run, slide, kick and bunny-hop to build up massive momentum. Time travel to dodge bullets and flank your enemies. Slow down time for easy kills!

name: Goat Scourge
description: Quiet village life is disturbed by the attack of the Ogre Sorcerer, who needs goat bones for his magical experiments. The beloved pet goat of a village boy is stolen - and he risks it all to save the goat's life. Help him retrieve his pet - and explore the village and its outskirts in our game.

name: Bulls and Cows: Wild West
description: On the farm, amidst green pastures and picturesque meadows, our little heroes will meet Vanessa - a clever and friendly cow-guide. She will enthusiastically explain the rules of the game and help children develop their logical abilities.

name: Runestone: Pathfinders
description: "Runestone: Pathfinder" is a 3D adventure platformer game set in the world of Runestone. Players will play as a rookie pathfinder and help the rookie get through his first trial.

name: Puzzle Adventure VR
description: Embark with us on a journey in Puzzle Adventure VR! A classic match blocks type game, for the first time in VR. Crush colorful blocks in a cartoon-styled VR world. Relaxing and intuitive, perfect for all ages, offering a blend of tranquil visuals, engaging puzzles, and a soothing soundtrack.

name: Escape from Darkness
description: Escape from Darkness is a single player, first person survival horror game. After waking up alone in a strange, eerie place. You must plunge into the oppressive darkness ignorant to what awaits. Survival depends on the use of stealth, finding limited resources, and quick wits.

name: BioChaos
description: A single-player/multiplayer adventure game with survival elements set in a post-apocalyptic world, featuring a top-down perspective on reluctant travelers with their own objectives. Galdan's goal is to bring the girl to a "home," while Ceder aims to change the world for better or worse.

name: DNA: Episode 2
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: Romance Fantasy
description: It's a two-person production game for fans by V-tuber 'Lee Jooin'.The development of the game began with the support of many 'Churros(fans)' written in the ending credits. Enjoy the romance fantasy stories of 'Lee Jooin' and 'Churros'

name: Graveskelet
description: In a deep and dark forest, skeletons rise up and you pick up your gun and start hunting them down to stop it.

name: Subversive Memories
description: A classic survival horror game set in the obscure backrooms of an old dictatorship. Unravel an ancient mystery, escape ominous presences, and scavenge every corner of this land.

name: Forest Keeper
description: Forest Keeper is a 3D logic game with many exciting levels!

name: Song of Eriel
description: "Song of Eriel" aims at building a game world with a deep economic and social system. Every NPC is vividly alive, with their own decisions and full range of emotions, naturally giving rise to a variety of stories. Here, you can chart your own course and author your distinctive saga.

name: Sled Builders
description: Physics-based sled-building game where only your imagination is the limit. Wishlist now!

name: Rune Gate: Retribution
description: Rune Gate: Retribution is a roguelite deckbuilder centered on card customization. Craft unique battle strategies with different runes. Face continuous challenges, where every choice can lead to victory or defeat. Dive into Rune Gate, unleash creativity, and explore endless card combinations.

name: Successful business
description: Successful business - A meditative game that will help you relax. You just started a new job and received your first order!

name: Enso
description: Slingshot your way to the top of a beautiful minimalist landscape. A deceptively tricky platformer where a single slip could lead to a long fall back down!

name: Shards Between Us
description: With their family and home on the brink of collapse, two magical sisters must find a way to grow together. Join their coming of age journey in this healing, heartfelt head-scratcher.

name: Fortune Deck
description: «Every card tells a story; your kingdom's fate rests in how you weave them together.»

name: Parhelion
description: This is a visual novel game. Players can obtain relevant information with npc and explore the maps on an island called Soraki to form their own understanding of this story. Can you continue to find the so-called truth by constantly trying to explore...

name: Gun Shop Simulator
description: Open and manage your own gun shop. Start small and expand/upgrade your business! Oh and also, crime rates have been going up lately, so be careful out there!

name: No Observer
description: First day on the job, and dispatched after a distress call you, find yourself in the middle of a threat filled mansion. Fight or run. Manage your inventory. Discover puzzles and bring to light the mystery within the mansion walls.

name: Exphysia
description: Exphysia is a new type of action role-playing game that allows players to move freely anywhere in a space where almost everything operates based on physical calculations. Become a slime that can enter anywhere and challenge dungeons and powerful enemies with the sexy otherworldly resident "Lumiers".

name: Secrets of the Tundra
description: Secrets of the Tundra is a 2D Top-Down Boss Rush game inspired by Shadow of the Colossus, Titan Souls, and Zelda. You are a greedy man in search of riches in the Tundra. Destroy the spirits to get what you always desired but for what price? Go forth and find the Secrets of the Tundra!

name: Kitty Kitty Bounce Bounce
description: Good old-fashioned arcade game in which you bop around a kitty using various cushions. Your goal is to break all breakable block without falling onto the floor. Difficulty levels, in-game shop where you can buy pick-me-ups with points you get for destruction, cute art and soundtrack, and much more!

name: Quadricolor: Ultra Sentai Color Ranger
description: Put on your sentai hero suit and join the chromatic battle! Protect the color balance in this lightning-fast 2D arena shooter. Snack it on with friends on a couch or online up to 4 players. Fight against evil forces and rise through the ranks in Quadricolor: Ultra Sentai Color Rangers.

name: Taimanin Yukikaze
description: A classic visual novel about a demon-slaying ninja. Yukikaze is an up-and-coming young Taimanin with a suite of deadly lightning powers, but when she embarks on a mission to rescue her missing mother, she just might have bitten off more than she can chew...

name: ChipWits
description: Challenge your brain in this open-ended robot programming puzzle game! Code your ChipWit to navigate logic-twisting puzzles, zap malfunctioning robots, and dominate the global leaderboards. Can you solve Dr. Droog's twisted game and restore order to the space station before it's too late?

name: Farm Racing
description: Farm Racing is a 3D car game in which an exciting adventure on the farm awaits you!

name: Life's Too Short GB: A Christmas Spirit
description: An enhanced version of the Playdate classic, now for Game Boys! Explore the mansion, meet various spooky characters and solve simple puzzles.

name: Him, The Smile & Bloom
description: Your boyfriend works at a flower shop. As if smiling at a flower, he showers you with love that’s both sweet and sour. These are four love stories connected by flowers.

name: Rogue Trooper
description: Rogue Trooper is a Genetic Infantryman (G.I.) of the future whose entire battalion was wiped out on their first mission in the Quartz Zone of Nu Earth. Rogue must navigate many platform levels and several first person style flying levels to get to the root of the treachery. He is assisted by three bio chips containing the personalities of three of his dead buddies; Gunnar, Helm and Bagman - unfortunately, Bagman's silicon is deteriorating. The plot is helped along with comic pages between levels. This game is based on the long-running 2000 AD comic character of the same name.

name: Telejogo II
description: Telejogo II is the sequel to the dedicated Pong clone home video game console made by the Brazilian subsidiary of Philco-Ford in 1979, now including ten games in the memory.

name: ESC
description: Experience the art of hacking as you unravel hidden secrets and accomplish intricate objectives. Type your commands to navigate the systems and unveil hidden secrets.

name: Mad Skills Motocross: Chasing the Dream
description: Mad Skills Motocross: Chasing the Dream is an authentic motocross racing experience that was developed by riders, for riders. It perfectly blends arcade-style mechanics with realistic track layouts and rider movements. Get ready to experience the thrill of motocross racing like never before.

name: Roomka
description: You woke up in a cell in the basement. What now?

name: Rekesh Gaal
description: You are a wanderer chosen to fight evil. Choose your path, explore gloomy locations and find secret places. Defeat your enemies through complex character development, hundreds of unique items and crafting.

name: Red End
description: A racing game. Under the azure sky, this is a huge racing park, dedicated to your race track.

name: Tears of Fish
description: This is a maze game where handsome armored warriors accidentally enter a mysterious maze.

name: Confiscator
description: Combining intense action and dark storytelling, Confiscator offers a unique experience where gritty shootouts and grime intertwine with the tragic tale of the protagonist on a path of self-destruction. Are you ready to become a confiscator?

name: Freak House
description: "Freak House" is an exciting horror-themed puzzle. You will have to help the main character unravel the mystery of the terrifying House he has found himself in! Your skill in finding objects and will be the key to solving the secrets of the House! Only you can determine the fate of the hero!

name: SokoFarm
description: SokoFarm is a Sokoban puzzle game with bright, cosy visuals and cute characters played out in a sleepy rural setting. Roll Chonky Chickens, Ducks and Geese to their preferred nests in the fewest moves possible. Play through the seasons to see new farms and features for even more brain teasing fun!

name: Exovoid
description: Survive the abyss in Exovoid – a souls-like odyssey. Battle, conquer, and shape your fate. Every death defines your journey. Are you ready?

name: Ranocta
description: Ranocta is a note-drop 2D rhythm game in a space that crosses straight and circular shapes. In an emotional and beautiful world full of colors and sounds, experience your own performance to recover lost light.

name: Mutant Monster Invasion
description: A classic tower defense game, ready to build dozens of turrets and use dozens of magic to destroy monsters?

name: Tennis Girl
description: The player is about to enter a girl's tennis academy, where the students are all beautiful, and extremely talented tennis girls. Outsiders call them "tennis girls". Player need to conquer these girls with you tennis skills!

name: Habitatrix
description: A water physics puzzle variety game.

name: 13 Floors: Anomalies
description: You get a strange job. Your job is to patrol a 13th-floor apartment, look for anomalies...

name: Kunkun Battles
description: In a 3D roguelike survival and crusade game, constantly acquire changing characters and skills to survive fighting against various enemies. Hold on for 12 rounds, and then the BOSS appears! You're going to shoot them. You will be number 1 forever If you are ikun, you are happier

name: Galactic Counselors
description: In this sci-fi strategy game, the Solar System of 4,000 A.D. is ravaged by wars between humanity's planetary colonies. These wars are directed by Supremes - the autocrat leaders of the planets. But each leader needs an advisor, and this is where you step in. Can you guide your ruler to victory?

name: Booeys: Rip in the Rift
description: In this supernatural sorting game, help Booey take control of objects from the human world and send them back through the rip in the rift. Built to empower the delivery of VB-MAPP assessments, explore endless opportunities for trial design in an all new format!

name: Snip It!
description: A 2D Qix-like retro arcade game. Draw lines to capture the canvas and defeat enemies!

name: Etherrealm
description: A rogue dungeon crawler with fast-paced live combat mechanics that are reminiscent of the classic souls-like game.

name: Number Shoot VR
description: Number Shoot VR is a gun shooting VR game where the aim is to destroy the approaching targets and achieve a high score. Quickly identify targets and non-targets, aim and pull the trigger.

name: The Vampire
description: The Vampire is a first-person horror adventure game designed for single player use only. Would you like to spend the night with Cooper, a stoic vampire hunter who holds the secrets of an ancient legend? Defeat the vampires and escape their world.

name: Mystery Box 5: Elements
description: Explore a new series of intricate boxes filled with alluring enigmas and brain-teasing challenges that will leave you a lasting impression

name: Hacker
description: This continuous viewing game brings a rich and colorful world

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Astronauts
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Astronauts is an puzzel game with cool astronauts in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Wind Field
description: This is a super fun action game made with a fresh and cute cartoon style

name: Qwepoi
description: Qwepoi is an arcade space shooter game using QWE IOP keys where you paint the Infantry ships before they enter the base.

name: Mango Goes to Mewsic School
description: Mango Goes to Mewsic School is a cute rhythm game where you play as a cat, Mango, trying to get into music school. Traverse a trap-laden environment to learn from the masters, who will teach you the basics of four different music genres.

name: Fantasy Creature Jigsaws
description: Piece together beautiful pictures of fantastical creatures. Dragons, Goblins, Manticores and more. Casual relaxing and satisifying.

name: Limp Heroes+
description: Limp Heroes+ is an action game in which players control a physically-driven hero to battle an army of evil villains. Using attractive characters with a touch of American Comics, players can challenge fierce battles with simple controls that require only jumping and special attacks.

name: Satellite Engineer
description: The artificial satellite with interrupted power supply needs repair. Let's navigate the space platform and collect the parts. If possible, challenge the mission with minimal movement to conserve energy.

name: The Cursor Game
description: Are you ready for the challenge? Guide your cursor through 30 difficult levels. Test your patience and precision in this casual hard game! Share your best times with #THECursorGame and become THE Cursor Master.

name: Dungeon Dev
description: The demon lord, who has been secretly trading with the human kingdom's king, summons you and requests your help in developing a special dungeon. It's none other than a dungeon where is narrowly defeated by the heroes!

name: Grr Boo I
description: GRR BOO i est un plateformer 2D. Il se distingue par ses graphismes enfantins, mais ne vous y trompez pas, la difficulté est trop grande pour des enfants.

name: Game of Life: Time
description: See the trajectory of Conway's Game of Life through time in a 3D perspective. Create cells, destroy cells, randomly generate cells, and observe the evolution of cell groups on the timeline!

name: Run for the Bus
description: "Run for the Bus" is a 3D third-person she-runner game. A girl who overslept in the morning runs after the bus she missed. Let her build her strength and chase her bus as she eats the bread.

name: Astronave
description: Astronave is a minimalist tube shooter.

name: Rogue Night
description: A rogue lite survival game - Confront hordes of undead, gather resources to build and survive. Explore locations and rescue NPCs who will aid on your journey.

name: Mudoku: Next Sudoku
description: Move + Sudoku = Mudoku !! Mudoku is addictive puzzle based on Sudoku.

name: ZenFire
description: Very casual click and shoot with some little minigames, reach 20k points to beat the game!

name: Computer Fury
description: Offline fighting game like 3rd person challenging fighting game, you can very easily make your any special move or difficult move during fight with any simple keyboard, using keyboard is more fun than x box game pad or pc game pad, but with x box game pad or pc game pad added vibration system

name: Rogue Stargun
description: Rogue Stargun is an action-packed space combat sim where you pilot 5 unique starfighters with interactive VR cockpits in a story-driven single player campaign consisting of over 24 unique missions covering both land and space.

name: Wijita: City of Makers
description: Simulate electronics, code robots, personalize your dream workshop, and connect with other passionate makers online.

name: Pixel Quest: Survivor
description: In this action roguelite with unique and themed characters, create your build and face hordes of enemies with up to 4 friends online, kill monsters, collect their souls, face bosses and survive!

name: Real Life
description: Survive the dungeon and return to the tavern with loot to go farther, or die alone and lose everything.

name: Fudgy Dice
description: From the fusion of dice games and deckbuilders rises a brand-new dice-builder. Embark on a crazy roguelike adventure with ramping relics and (literally) exploding dice or challenge your friends in local multiplayer with one of 7 unique characters.

name: Boink
description: Boink! A game about falling money and building bouncers to increase the money. Purchase bouncers and place them on the map. Upgrade bouncers and the cannon to boost value. Rebirth to gain unique upgrades. Watch your money grow!

name: Song of Yosef
description: Song of Yosef is a Metroidvania platformer with wacky enemies and fun physics.

name: Mech Builder
description: Welcome to Mech Builder- a relaxing puzzle game inspired by Model building(gunpla). You will experience the relaxing process of building a model kit with complete freedom with over 50+ puzzles.

name: Ringo's Roundup
description: Solve grid-based puzzles, guide Postbunny Ringo's car through a variety of environments and collect all the scattered envelopes in this cute pathfinding puzzle game!

name: Rest to Landia
description: Resttolandia: A thrilling adventure as you embody a determined streamer aiming for the top. Master precision jumps, dodge obstacles, and climb closer to streaming stardom. Can you reach the summit and join the elite? Jump into action now!

name: Next Room
description: It is a single-player 3D scene puzzle type game that interacts with objects in a room from a first-person perspective to find a way to the next room. The game is made up of high-quality models, bright skies and warm sunlight, so find your way to the next room in this cozy room!

name: Sudoku Constellation
description: Sudoku gives a sense of calm, relaxation, and resonance with the universe, relieving stress, reducing anxiety, and helping players reconnect to their inner peace. Gameplay Description: Just keep the 'numbers' or 'constellations' in each row, column, and house without repeating.

name: Rhythm & Beats
description: Get into the groove of the beat with Rhythm & Beats. Focused on VR play but supports keyboard and mouse. Play to your favorite songs or playlist with 5 levels of difficulty.

name: Bankruptcy
description: This game was made for Ludum Dare 50. It's pretty tight.​Buy and sell properties for your inherited failing real estate business. You can’t stop it from going under, but perhaps you can delay the inevitable long enough to make yourself some real money! TIPS AND TRICKS: -Listing prices will fluctuate depending on Trends. Buy uptrending properties early to maximize profit, and avoid buying downtrending properties unless you can immediately sell them. -Properties in your inventory when the markets close will be sold for 80 percent of their Value automatically.

name: Gnosis
description: A dark atmospheric test that asks you to see things in new ways, including the experience of playing itself. In this love letter to flash horror, explore 60 ending permutations and reactivity to your answers, as the game not only allows but implores you to play and break it how you see fit.

name: Largo
description: Become a security camera operator and survey creepy environments, spot the differences and report anomalies.

name: Hold The Noise
description: Listen to beautiful and captivating noises! It will be truly amazing. Are you ready to hear some great noise? Just press and hold the space bar. Are you really ready now?

name: Runombie
description: In a misty forest, you play as a hungry zombie, you constantly run, must catch up with humans to fuel to survive, careful not to run into your own kind.

name: Fast Beat Battle Rider
description: I will be entitled "the fastest"! Slip between the cars that try to block you on your motorbike and run through the highway in a "super-highspeed-battle'' just like in movies! The more you use the machine, the higher the status will be. Improve your skills and defeat the first Ghost Rider!

name: The Chronicles of Penghao: Ming
description: "The Chronicles of Penghao: Ming" is a 3D action RPG game where players assume the role of an ordinary person during the late Yuan and early Ming Dynasty, witnessing the ebb and flow of countless lives amidst the historical currents.

name: Godrop
description: One level of warning, cosmic droplet rampage! A roguelike game featuring impact piercing. Collect holy relics, build up your energy, and morph the droplets to invade the solar system and destroy the ignorant human fleet to the ground!

name: Loli Racing
description: Loli Racing is a Japanese-style kart racing game, the overall operation difficulty is low and easy to get started, there are 15 types of karts and characters can choose from, in terms of maps, there are 38 tracks with different themes to play, support single-player and multiplayer

name: Find My Weiner
description: Embark on a whimsical journey through vast and vibrant fields of grass to reunite with your beloved weiner. But this isn't just any weiner—it's your four-legged friend who's gone on an adventure of their own! This game offers a blend of humor, heart, and the untold thrill of the hunt.

name: Kill Me If You Can
description: "Kill Me If You Can" combines roguelike, RPG, and construction for a survival defense against zombies. Explore by day for growth, and at night, build defenses against incoming zombies. With unique skills per character, control a team, not just one, for dynamic gameplay.

name: Truck Job
description: A casual truck driving game. Deliver the cargo safely through different obstacles, challenges and enemies.

name: Kalpa: Cosmic Symphony
description: Kalpa, the authentic mobile 5-key rhythm game, is now available on STEAM! The doomed universe needs you to play your life away. Play your life's music with Kalpa to save the dying Yggdrasil and revive the universe!

name: One More Night
description: You will have to survive zombies and mysterious creatures in a fantasy world, in which you find your lost brother, while you will level up and you will have 2 weapons with you throughout the adventure, you will be able to explore a giant world without restrictions

name: Backrooms: Meg Archives
description: Backrooms:MEG Archives is a single-player horror exploration game. Experience the hidden layers of the MEG archive, explore that dusty story in danger, and witness the hierarchical adventures of the explorer's predecessors.

name: Graytail
description: Graytail is a Zelda-like action-adventure game with interactive puzzles and combat set on a small island in the Pacific. Find the missing best female pilot and uncover the secrets hidden on the island.

name: Dowon
description: This game features captivating storytelling, rich interactivity, diverse puzzles, and branching narratives based on player choices. As players guide Nara through various events, they'll develop relationships with male characters, solve puzzles, and shape the story's outcome through their decisions.

name: WordLeap
description: This action-based word game will test your knowledge by giving you higher rewards for less common words. Jump from tile to tile, picking up letters as you go to spell out words that can be exchanged for points.

name: Jeepney Simulator 2
description: Embrace your inner jeepney driver once again in the big, bustling streets of Manella City! Pick up passengers, calculate change, and weave through traffic in this one-of-a-kind driving game. Bring your friends, customize your jeepneys, and face rising quotas. Will you survive? or fade into history?

name: Pawnholm
description: Island survival RTS rogue-lite, with mysteries behind every corner. Assign your pawns to craft, build, explore, and upgrade your kingdom. Every randomly generated island holds unique secrets to be uncovered. As the Duke of Pawnholm, will you lead your pawns to prosperity ...or to calamity?

name: Nixxsz Maids Blazing
description: Nixxsz Maids Blazing is a very simple and small score-attack arena "slasher" set in a Dark Castle. Choose a maid, master her habilities and cut in half all enemies! Cut. Slash. Repeat!

name: Survival Z The Alpha
description: Be the First Zombie and Start a Great Achievement:Infect the Whole World,Grow your Zombie Poplulations.

name: Add Astra
description: Add Astra is a math game about racing, and a racing game about math, developed by Coincidence. You’re the best arithmetech racer on Earth. But what about everywhere else?

name: Stream or Die!
description: Become the greatest streamer of all time in STREAM OR DIE! Embark on your quest for fame by streaming a wild new MMO - where your choices can rocket you to viral glory or comically seal your doom.

name: Code Name Teacher
description: As an undercover cop, you'll infiltrate a criminal organization to bring it down. As a teacher, your mission is to stop the gang in school and the neighborhood! Your choices shape the story, relationships, and outcomes. The decisions are yours.

name: SMYS: Classic
description: SMYS : Classic is a 2-4 local multiplayer stairs building race game. This version of SMYS is what the game was planned to be when it was first designed, the Classic version.

name: Sleep Terror
description: The game "Sleep Terror" is a horror adventure game that tells the story of a teenager waking up at night in his own dream. Travel to different places in your head to get out of the nightmare

name: Forest Hills: The Last Year
description: Enter the nightmarish world of Forest Hills, where you and four other Displaced try to survive, fight back and ultimately escape a horrifying Fiend in this unique horror asymmetric game.

name: Call Center Tycoon
description: Call Center Tycoon is a business management simulation game where the goal is to get the best out of your employees. Keep your employees stress level's low and they will perform better increasing your profits and your market share. Make key decisions and watch the action unfold.

name: Alien Paradise
description: A rhythm game where you help an alien to have the best vacation on Planet Earth

name: Morn
description: As a minister of the church and a founding member of the prestigious and secretive Helsing Society, it is your job to banish the world of the unholy. Rage war against maleficent entities such as; vampires, werewolves, demons and their worshipers to cleanse Gods kingdom of the evil festering within.

name: Frayed
description: A small survival horror game set in a cornfield. Sneak around on the farm, solve puzzles and uncover the mysteries of the past! Try not to get lost in the corn...

name: A Good Night's Rest
description: Face monsters from the depths of your subconscious by night and the trials of young adulthood by day in this hand-drawn turn-based tactical RPG. Make friends and manage resources to maintain your mental health and finally get.. A Good Night’s Rest.

name: My Head On Your Body
description: A short psychological horror story about a girl, a murder, and a missing head.

name: Wolves in Sheep's Clothing
description: In this asymmetrical multiplayer game, players are either cunning wolves, disguising themselves among sheep to hunt, or vigilant farmers tasked with protecting their flock. Master deception and strategy in a tense battle of wits.
